lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're happy to be back. We all had an awesome break; some good times away from the chaos of the city for some of us. And we're happy to get this ball rolling again. So we've missed you guys. In case you can't tell right now, we have some cool upgrades to the set, actually, if you want to have a look around real fast. The hardworking folks here at Geek and Sundry were awesome enough to go ahead and build this awesome set, and we're happy enough to have a guest here this evening, as Ashley Johnson is able to hang with us tonight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello! I like you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ashley! When did you get here!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man, you know, I just flew in. Oh no, we're running out of space. Grog! Hi, guys. Wow, this looks amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, I believe tonight, is it, tonight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tonight is the last night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The very last night to purchase your Critmas sweaters--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then it's gone forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Forever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I lived in mine over the holiday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you did. Every time I saw you were wearing it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're very soft on the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very soft.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have not seen a picture of my brother without his.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're so comfy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so glad that we've converted your brother into a dungeon master.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel so bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we found out your parents watch! We had no idea your parents watched.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, my parents were like, yeah, no, we'll be there, we'll watch it. I was like, really? In Hawaii? In the middle of the jungle? Like, yeah, I guess we're Critters. I'm like, my parents are Critters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your parents are Critters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Hi, guys, if you're watching. We still have the awesome Wyrmwood Gaming thing they're providing for all you guys. They have their custom dice boxes and containment elements.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: CritRole, and the shipping is free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Isn't that cool?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think this is also technically yours, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that box is hers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we put expansion pack spell cards in there that we can all use.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, Wyrmwood Gaming, CritRole for free shipping. That's awesome. Thank you, guys, again for providing that for our awesome fanbase. Also, I've just finally put up my final-- outside of, barring some horrible exploit that shows up months from now-- my final update to the Blood Hunter class as of ten minutes ago. You can go to my twitter. I think the link on the Geek and Sundry page isn't working, it still goes to the old PDF, but I had the link to the new PDF on my twitter, will be put up there shortly. A bunch of updates and with a link to the page that has all the patch notes, if you will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And new art.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And new art from our fantastic artist Joma who has done our poster and stuff; he did an incredible job. He named the character Elias and I think Elias the Blood Hunter is my new spirit animal. So thank you, Joma, for that, you're amazing, and go check it out and see. If you're playing a Blood Hunter, it's got some cool updates and I think some things you'll like. Also, our artist Kit Buss put up today her first peek of our new character art designs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She put it all up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's all up? She put it all up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She did a group shot and then she did this long row of each separate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I haven't seen that one yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It's pretty remarkable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Season two. Season two art.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know when this became season two, but apparently, it's season two now. So. Season two. (laughs) That's cool. So go check out Kit's art and you get to see the evolution of the Vox Machina outfits and designs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have poofy arms now. I like my poofy arms. I've got little poofy arms. They're great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got body paint. Ashy body paint.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And don't think this invalidates the previous designs, either. This is just one of their various facets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have more than one set of clothes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, otherwise, we'd all smell like Grog.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh, burn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Diss!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wanted to put a thank-you out there to the amazing community of Critters that came together to do that Christmas art bomb. For those who haven't seen it yet, Liam here collaborated with a lot of you guys to put together an amazing gallery of Christmas, holiday-themed Critical Role art, and it's brilliant. If you haven't seen the gallery yet, I highly recommend it. You can find it on the website. You are a rogue, sir.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It came out great. I was extremely happy, so were they, so were you, so win-win.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So much art.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're looking forward to continue working with us. We're looking forward to continue working with them, as well as the many other charities that we put up as part of our Guide to Critmas page. But they're very thankful and we're extremely thankful to have you guys being so active in giving back to the communities and helping these wonderful opportunities for younger kids to express their imaginations and creative writing skills. So thank you guys for being so awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reading and writing is good. It's very imp-- imp-- is good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very impotent?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for running with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We got to get Grog on a side quest for 826LA.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're very impotent to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't make it too hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (rimshot) All righty, so. While we wait for Sam to arrive, let's go ahead and get into the game--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, it's so pretty! The panels behind us. I was just admiring--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So picking up from there, it's been a few days since the Winter's Crest festival has finished, and most of the decorations, as quickly put together as they were given the circumstances, still loosely hang around the city as a reminder of the first real beacon of positivity in this city's history in a while. The town's much more lively, as people are less afraid to walk out into the streets during the day and it's like watching it really come to life over these past few weeks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sam's here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog wouldn't be paying attention anyway. It's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Squirrel!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (Grog voice) It's true. It's very true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've sent off word to Allura in Emon regarding the strange black dot that stands at the top of the ziggurat and letting her know the circumstance, and heard back from her that it seems that-- (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Smooth. Well done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back, Sam Riegel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where am I?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. It's so magical.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on? Oh my god, Ashley's here! Oh my god, you're here! Okay, sorry. You were recapping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. So where was I? Yes, okay. So with the town being set where it is, you sent word to Allura Vysoren, and she's going to gather a few friends and investigate the ziggurat to see what the nature of this lingering magic is. However, there still stands the part of returning to the Council and proving your innocence, amongst other loose threads you wish to pursue. What would you like to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we have all that awesome proof, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we need to head back to Emon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have proof? What do we have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have all of the documents that you took from the Briarwoods' stuff. Plus, we have--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Physical? Do we have someone who could back up our testimony?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The new rulers, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, they're not going to come with us, are they?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we've got Percival. He's kind of in charge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm kind of a big deal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like they'll see that as a conflict of interest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we bring someone along to corroborate our stories?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about-- I know someone needs to mind the store here in town, but Cassandra was in their pockets for a long time, and what about Father--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yennen? Yevon? Yennen?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could have them write a letter, and we can seal it and then it would be official.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make sure that they notarize it and all that good stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: People have to take this seriously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. They can't very well arrest Percival when he's royalty now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Technically royalty before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, now he's rich royalty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have money now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we? How much money do we have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It depends on what we want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Depends on what we want?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't bankrupt the treasury or anything, but I'm sure that we can dip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't put a number on family.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Flying carpet gold?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's actually a very good question.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we go get a letter and we go back to Emon and clear our name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's our evidence?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus all of the documents that you found!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, paper trail.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, that's a really interesting idea. Is there anybody in town who could reenchant our carpet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he said it would take a year, and you'd need to have Allura work on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm asking the Yellow Pages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of which, their abode or their shop had been collapsed and they were no longer seen, and the other one had apparently been acquired by the Briarwoods to aid them in the construction of the ziggurat and you met his daughter, and he never turned up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Maybe we can wait until we get back to Emon and have Gilmore do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll talk to them and see what's possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we can't really ask Allura to do it. We stole the carpet from her in the first place. That would be a very bad move, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we could just say somebody stole it from her. We stole it from them, we were trying to return it, it fell in acid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But then what? We wouldn't get it back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, she fixes it. Oh, here's a gift for recovering the rug. It makes perfect sense to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, she was just using it as a rug.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that seems like a really expensive rug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe she was keeping it secret. Keeping it safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, forget it. Let's just go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to craft that thing that I've been wanting to craft, so that was, that we talked about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so over the past few days. Okay. As you guys are all preparing the circumstance over these next few days, you've gone into your original workshop, which is a little more ramshackle than the one you have back in Emon that was built for you. This was just the one that you had pieced together while you were growing up in Whitestone. I would like for you to go ahead and make a tinkering check, if you don't mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, we had them send word to Uriel, remember? We had them send a letter to Uriel, explaining all the wonderful things we did. Yes, I talked to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did the golden snitch do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not well. Not with that face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I use my resolve?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a saving throw, unfortunately. That's not a skill check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11? This is to craft the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I'm doing the whole kit and caboodle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The entire thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if I can break it up into chunks, then that will be-- taking it apart. I'm going to take it apart, I'm going to put it back together, and I'm going to add the fifth barrel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (sighs) You manage to pull apart, over the period of a few days, Ripley's pistol. You take aspects of whitestone and residuum dust as well as residuum glass and begin to reconstruct it, based on its elements, in a much more refined, in a much more Percival-practiced method. You attach the fifth barrel, the one that you intend to be used to deliver short-range explosives, and it

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's nothing fancy, and a little part of you goes like, it's rattling a little when you shake it in your hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I give it a once-over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception check. No, this would be investigation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate you. The difference between those rolls are really impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is where the intellect plays off, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa! Okay, I'm going to point out that I just rolled my die before the game started and rolled a natural 20 on my first roll. Five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 2016, bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It looks pretty solid. You think it would be wise to take additional materials with you as you leave, just in case you want to build something else, but this seems functional.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got all the little bits. I'm going to definitely-- I've learned my lesson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So in theory, going forward, the gun does function, but every misfire number is increased by two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that gives me a three and a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A misfire of three on the pistol and what is now a misfire of five with the fifth barrel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll be funny. Oh, I also have to make some ammo for it, since it's individual ammo, so should I just roll for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, for the ammunition it has to be a little more specific. We'll get to that. With the time you have at this point, you've just managed to finish that before you guys are ready to go. Cool, all right. So what's the intent, guys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're heading back to Emon. But we did send a letter ahead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sent a letter, notifying them of what has happened, that Whitestone has been freed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And remember I said make sure to tell them how Vox Machina saved the day, and how wonderful we are, and you said, yes you would do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, that's been sent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So all the messages-- because I sent word out to Gilmore, as well-- we haven't heard anything back from anyone, though. It's too soon, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been pretty soon. That was just a few days ago in Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I also think I probably sent a letter to Pike to let her know that we're safe and we survived everything, and that she would've been at Winter's Crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was hard thinking of an address in Vasselheim that would reach her, but you did your best to conjecture, and you attempted it, so we'll see if it finds its way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe it worked! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so how are you guys getting back to Emon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On our horses that we own. Do we own horses?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were eaten by harpies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go buy some horses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the harpies that we own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They've got to, right? They have horses here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a couple liveries here that do sell, aside from keeping the horses of the actual guard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, you have the run of this place, somewhat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to assume that I can use some family connections to finagle a few horses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'd say you're looking at probably about five to six days' travel on horseback to get back to Emon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a faster way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no teleportation circles, is there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. They don't have one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't you walk us through an oak tree?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can. Yeah. Actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, walk us through an oak tree!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Long as we all jump within six seconds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happens if we don't?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're left behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's not a challenge, really. It's just a very short time period. Yeah, you can do that if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have an instant teleportation as a worst-case scenario.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And where does it take us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Home. To our keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds crazy. Can we always use this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll actually in theory beat the letters that we sent. That's okay; we have proof.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it's coming. It's on the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So wait, you can zap us anywhere in the world?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a 6th-level spell called Teleportation via Plants, where as long as I've seen the tree before, we can walk through the tree.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: We're getting another letter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sealed, so it looks like we didn't tamper with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough to get it signed by Keeper Yennen, you get it signed by Cassandra.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And everything is good here for when we go, Percival? Your sister and everyone, Keeper what's-his-butt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anything goes wrong, we'll hear about it, and we can come back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on with the spinning black cube? Are we okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't Allura on her way here? Aren't a lot of people on their way here? I'm so confused.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, wasn't Allura on her way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Start from the beginning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, first there were dinosaurs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Last you were told, Allura is coming with a couple of companions to investigate the ziggurat. There was no indication that you're required for that, nor could you really aid in that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Speak for yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, your vast understanding of arcane elements and the history of magic should come in handy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Drez Vina, right? He's coming, too? He's had a notice to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drez Vina?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not Drez Vina.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's in the Wayback Machine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't seen Drez Vina in about a year and a half.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The emperor dude?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Victor, the powder guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you looking for the notes that you don't take?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take notes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ivan from the other show? Do you mean Ivan, from the show before us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to find his name, don't you guys worry, then I'm going to bring it right up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's the brains of the group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we go get that other fucking letter please?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: We got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You acquired it. It didn't take much time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Theoretically, they were trying to keep Allura from us, anyway, so it's not like she can help us in Emon. Right? So we can go home.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Let's go home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's hop in a tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's hop in a tree. What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to say, here's what we don't know: if we beat the letters home, if we try to walk up with the letter, we should send someone to them with the letter because probably Uriel came to his senses once Sylas was hit with some dicks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, we can't go find that boy you abused in Emon and have him send the letter?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That little kid you smacked around who wanted to join--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's long gone, man. I don't know where he is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's probably back, drawing pictures of you on the city walls and crying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get in line. But I don't think we want to walk up ourselves, just in case. We should send somebody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll head home. We'll send our butler.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's senile and gentle; they'll be kind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. They'll be very wonderful to him. I can't find it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Well, let's jump through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we need more letters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also, be reminded, you that you have a prisoner in the bottom of Greyskull Keep that was a survivor of the Briarwood--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If he's still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you haven't checked in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll find out as soon as we get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least he'll be going home to a very nice surprise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got one gold piece he's turned to kibble.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I hope our keep's still there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go, can I shit-scry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To see our keep to make sure it's not on fire? That's not a bad idea. Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For people tuning in for the first time, I'm going to give you no context.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to concentrate really hard on my bowels. See if I can see anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roleplay this, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fiber. No movement yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you concentrate and close your eyes, you take a moment to connect with that one moment in Greyskull Keep, above the kitchen where you had left your last present.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a gift to the world, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This being relatively early morning on this part of the countryside, you do look in and you see that there is part of a breakfast being cooked for whoever's running the guard time-portion that part of the morning. Currently, nothing else catching your attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Breakfast being cooked, seriously.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys want some pancakes and bacon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deep-fried French toast, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see Laina in there walk in and start cooking up some stuff and walk back out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, and she doesn't look like she's bleeding from the eyes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she looks to be quite healthy and quite jovial, whistling a little tune, although you can't hear it so well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eskil Ryndarien was the one I was thinking of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, Eskil Ryndarien. That's the one, yeah. The archmage in Westruun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those notes are written on her Pathfinder sheet, tucked in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll come in real handy. All right, great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we do this, Keyleth? And more importantly, how do we do it so that the bear doesn't come with us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The bear will probably be able to come with us. Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pick a fat tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we have a really big fat tree right in the town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After all that pie, Trinket's a little wide in the haunches.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He looks good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He can fit through the Sun Tree, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Sun Tree's definitely a large enough tree to create the portal you can step through, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's use the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So the rest of you guys gather towards the center of the town square in the middle of Whitestone. You approach the Sun Tree, and Keyleth, you step forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, hey boo. I'll see you soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the tree silently fist bump you through its arcane connection.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You be good, you take care of you, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a voice whisper in the back of your mind, "You too, girl."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the best tree of all time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tolkien would be proud, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you trace your fingers across the surface of the Sun Tree, its large, curled boughs now starting to sprout remnants of what looks to be fresh leaves. Where your fingers trace, the bark itself seems to glow with a bright vibrant yellowish-orange color. As you create a full oval shape that would fit most of your party, suddenly, there's a sucking sound, and it's like the bark is pulled into a distant doorway. And from what you can see, it's almost like someone carved a tunnel through the Sun Tree that traverses for about 30 or so feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are these cartoon physics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! We should go soon, though. Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jump!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you come bursting out of the other side of one of the trees that is currently planted inside the temple to Sarenrae within Greyskull Keep, and as you all gather yourselves and hear the closing sound, the (sucking sound) of the doorway closing behind you, you glance about and you can see all the stained glass, the rosebushes that are well kept, there are a series of small wooden benches that are placed in a pattern, and behind you, you see currently wiping down the stone on the front of the temple is, in plain clothes, a sleepy-eyed, currently woken-up Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you doing here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are you sleeping outside? You have a bed upstairs!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I do! I couldn't sleep!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you were in Vasselheim!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long have you been here? So many questions!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you had heard the party was going to Whitestone, you were already in fear of what may lie there, knowing the history of Percy's past and hearing bits here and there. You came to try and catch them before they left, but by the time you came to Emon, they had already been gone for quite some time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you've been scrying to us the whole time from here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why didn't you say anything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't think to say anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We literally kicked it for a weekend and went to a festival. We could've come back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, but work needed to be done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So thoughtful, Pike! Oh, my best friend! She's so thoughtful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you guys made it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, thanks to you. (excited stammering) Did you feel our bag of dicks that we did? Were you aware of our bag of holy light dicks? That was an out-of-context thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what that is, but it sounds pretty fascinating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and you teamed up, and we killed Lady Briarwood by--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yes, how could I forget!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I didn't know how aware you were, because your connection was fuzzy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fully aware of the bag of dicks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was awesome!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I totally spaced. Oh wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who taught you the phrase "bag of dicks?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I read it in a book.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bag of Richards.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bag of Richards?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you seen the prisoner here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's a prisoner here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't, actually, in the time you've been here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I haven't. I've been cleaning. I've had such a need to clean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go. We run down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys head out of the temple, it leads you into the main foyer area. Stepping out into the foyer, you immediately hear a loud metal clang in the hallway around to your right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it my armor just falling over? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you all immediately stop for a moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hello? What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear some other rustling down at the edge of the hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we on the top floor, or down where the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are in the foyer of the main temple's base floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Pike, stay here. I'll take care of this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was born sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go forth to investigate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As he walks down the stairs, I call out: don't get caught, shithead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you come around the corner into the main central hallway of the foyer you can see there is, to the right is the dining room area, and that's closed, and you can smell the breakfast being cooked in the kitchen that's far down to the right of the hallway. To the left is the arcane laboratory. The door is currently ajar, and you hear the rustling from the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, someone's going through our shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going in there to investigate. You know what? I'll go invisible first, and then I'll creep in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so. Your image dissipates and vanishes. As you tiptoe up and peek around the corner of the doorway, you can see now there's a few small metallic instruments that have fallen to the ground, and you see a familiar humanoid red dragon-scaled individual who is currently picking up. (grumbling) "Confounded thing." And puts it into a bag and starts tying it up and is currently packing up the laboratory.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I drop my invisibility and go over and give Tibsy a big hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out of nowhere you, (startled grumbling) And pushes you away and grabs the staff and spins around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's me! It's me! Little, yellow, different! Me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You mustn't sneak up on a Stormwind like that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I just, it's been so long and we've been through so much without you. I was overcome, I'm sorry. Friends, it's all right! Pike, I cleared the danger!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go in. Hi Tibs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys walk in, you see Tiberius seems both surprised and keeping a composure element to him, his chin high. "Greetings and salutations, friends. I'd hoped I'd see you before "heading out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Heading out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Heading what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I've spent a few weeks in Draconia trying to secure aid for us in Whitestone."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you from Draconia?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I respect you all very deeply, and hope to "continue to hear of your exploits across Tal'Dorei, but I think it is time--" And he takes his staff and smacks it on the ground and picks up his bag of things. "I think it is time this "dragonborn carved his own path."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You must leave immediately?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've been packing for a few days, as you know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go up and hug him, and say: what would you like us to tell Uriel? I know they are wanting you in court.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The politics of these strange human kingdoms don't really affect me. At least I figure "you've got this taken care of, and you'll speak in my name, of course, right, right?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. So. Don't mess that up."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course not, darling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At the time they'd even come to find me, I'm sure the name would be cleared."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I come out behind my sister and I take him by the hand and I say: Tiberius, your friendship was always valued here. I don't think we'd be standing here without you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's true."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will never forget you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As I shall never forget all of you." And you can see for a second there's a little tear cresting in his nose, and he like, "Dust. You know that, of course." He looks around, takes a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Speaking as a man who has also had a romantic interest in ladies before-- are there any romantic messages you'd like me to pass on for you to anyone in this town? Or others.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns to Keyleth, and takes Keyleth and goes, "If you see her, tell Allura I'm sorry. But "she's always welcome to visit me in Draconia."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will. Bye, Tibsy. I give him a hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Goodbye." Flicks his wrist and you can see an already prepared teleportation circle in the room flash with blue runes as his image, waving towards you, scatters into nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The runes die down to a cold magicless circle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Safe travels, Stormwind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he leave us anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on. Maybe we should check his room just in case.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I'm saying! Oh, we have a prisoner downstairs, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, that's right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, yes, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We run down to the prison cell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stay and walk around his room a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the rest of you head down, you find your way to the basement where your workshop is, and there, sitting in a chair, currently eating a small steel platter of breakfast, is Jarett, who looks up immediately as you walk in and says, (laughs) "Good morning to all of you! It has been "quite some time since we've spoken. I am glad to see that you're well and in one piece. Everything "here has been fine." And he points back to, you can see on the bed that was dragged down into the prison cell. Oh, no, I think it was actually dragged away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dragged back out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dragged back out. See within the cell is the small boy from Whitestone who's also now eating off his own small platter as well, and his eyes light up, mouth full of eggs. (muffled talking) He seems to be fine and in good health.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any other attacks on the castle while we were gone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, how did you fare?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There were no other attacks as far as I know, we kept a very very close eye, and for a "while we had a fine elemental protector from, with help here from Lady Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, how did that work? Just curious, because he was kind of a test run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, very unsettling, to be perfectly honest. "

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh good, good. That's what I was going for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It historically has gone very poorly, so it was good to know that nothing bad terribly happens."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure! Awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, the good news is, we can let you go. You're free and clear, the Briarwoods will not be a problem anymore, and Whitestone is rather pleasant at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's not free and clear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got to come with us to testify.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's right, I suppose there is the matter of testimony.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come down the stairs at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we can open the cell, at the very least.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, why is he still in that cell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For his own protection, but that's hardly a matter anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, remember, we were going to let him stay him the guest room, but he was like, I'm going to stay--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jarrett steps aside and starts opening the cell as the boy finishes swallowing his eggs and sits up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boy, what was your name again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Waiting to see if she has it in her notes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I mean, I'll find it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got it, I've got it somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's in my old notebook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Always fun to test these things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I asked you a direct question. But that's all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) His name was Lola--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) If I recall, it begins with a 'D.'

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dylan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matthew Mercer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ben Klauss.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anemone Tea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Desmond. Desmond? Desmond!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I knew one of you wrote it down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Desmond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Desmond goes, "It's over? The Briarwoods are no more?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. All taken care of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you visually see a weight off his shoulders. He seems to shrink almost three inches from just the full exhale of his body, and a little bit of tears well up in his eyes and he says, "Whitestone? Does it still stand?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's beautiful. And growing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can't wait to get back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Desmond, dear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before you do, could we ask a small favor of you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you mind speaking on our behalf to Emperor Uriel? Emperor? Sovereign Uriel. That'd be great. That'd just be wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, I'd be happy to, it'd be my pleasure."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. And you can, you know, come out of the cell and eat with us, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great." And he goes and off the little stone slab there he pulls his platter, which is already half-eaten, and eagerly walks up holding it with you, expectantly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right now! Sure, let's go then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, let me carry your plate for you. And I start eating his food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way back up to the dining room area, and it's at that time that you see, coming down the hall, Laina. Turns around the corner and goes, "Pike?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi! There's more of us now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, goodness me, look, everyone's returned! That's wonderful, it's so good to see all of you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to see you too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've kept the house in order. Good job, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've done my best. I'm so excited to see that you're all well. You don't look very well "fed. I can fix that. Come on, this way."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brilliant. Brilliant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you dined on some really, really fine Whitestone food while you were enjoying the fruits of the Winter's Crest festival, it is nice to have a home-cooked meal for a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Traditional Emon breakfast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eggs, baked beans--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, fried tomato. Yeah, blood sausage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you finished your meal, what is your next order of business?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's today? What day is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there days of the week? What is a weekend?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, there's days of the week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this world? How does time work here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are days of the week, I'm not gonna go into the specifics of it because I'm working on it. This question hasn't really arisen before and I probably should figure that out. It's the equivalent of a Thursday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's always Thursday.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's not hump day but we're not quite waiting for the weekend yet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hump day!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, Grog. By the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah? Shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you think I'd forget?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I throw him a gold coin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought Kibble would be dead, but he's alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Desmond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Desmond.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You call him Kibble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we were just saying how well you look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, keep eating, Kibble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just continues finishing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If he dies, you don't get the gold coin back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How is his hand doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Missing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, is it okay, there's no gangrene?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it was properly dressed and has been changed as time went on while you guys were gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, no Pike didn't know he was here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's unfortunate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She didn't go downstairs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't, I just didn't need to go down there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But there it is, right in front of you, all red and swollen, gross.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How's his hand? How's your hand, Desmond?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you do this? Can you do this, Desmond?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crying into his eggs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's mean, that's mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Him and little boys, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought Desmond was like a teenager. Is he, how young is he?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I did too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, he's like close to 18, 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, there we go, a kid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Impressionable. Formative years.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of age.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of age.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is his hand gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's bandaged over, and he's still able to kind of use part of the thumb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had a really bad day. I had a really bad day.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try doing a little healing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was possessed by an evil smoke demon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Might as well. Get the dice rolling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Pike! Everyone stand back, my lady's going to do something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's going to try and undo some of my poor decision-making.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you grow back his digits?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't think so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tell the truth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good question.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think Whitestone owes this boy a little coin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would agree. Perhaps send him, I will send him--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, after his testimony, should it prove to be valuable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much coin did we pull out of the treasury of Whitestone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about we don't talk about this in front of other people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could give him one of the expensive bottles of wine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How about I send him with a letter making sure that he is well-employed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that is a beautiful, beautiful gesture.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should solve all of our problems with letters from now on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If people would just learn, oh never mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival. Coin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fine. Fine.

lines.text: I'm not sure what the price tag on a--

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: Yes.

lines.text: Restoration is more of a, restoration is more of a removal of impairments to, on like the whole, like curses, charms, things that affect their body and mind wholly. Current, you know, like that. What you're looking for is more of a very minor regeneration, which I would allow to a very small extent with a high-powered heal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just blow in his thumb and all the fingers go--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, you grew one of Liam's, Vax's toes back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That took a long time, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we really care about Vax, and this guy can look down at his hand and remember the time that he worked for some shitty vampires. We leave it be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you wanna do, Pike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has he stabilized, is he stable?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to try healing him a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so what level Cure Wounds you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead for a level two Cure Wounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I inspire her healing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, actually, 'cause I'm gonna have a wisdom check from her in a moment as part of that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'm going to inspire her with a limerick.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d8 plus five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: O'Brien approves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There once was a gnome from Emon, who sang a scandalous song, the ladies would swoon, at his rather large tune, and say "My, it's impossibly long." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's beautiful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow, that was so inspiring. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you heal 15 points, that's good. Go ahead and roll a d20, add your wisdom modifier which I think is plus five, and then add another d10 to that because of his inspiration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d10 just to add on to it, see how--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got a 20?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This guy's gonna get a brand-new hand!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Three hands! Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as part of the healing, as you take his hand, you pull the bandages off, and you can still see the wounds are scabbed over, and it's healing but it's healing over. As you concentrate for a moment, close your eyes, you can see the symbol of Sarenrae and that glows for a moment, and that healing energy transfers down your arms to your forearms, to your fingertips, and into the wound. And his hand begins to give off its own radiant energy. He freaks out and backs up for a second, but you--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- keep his hand there, calm him down. As the light fades, you can see the wound itself is now closed over entirely, and the part where he can only partially use his thumb and his finger, that section has completely healed over and both his thumb and his pinky finger are complete now. And can be used to grab.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like a claw, like a crab.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's functional! There you go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hang loose, buddy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got shaka hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Much more useful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it doesn't hurt anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. No longer needs any dressing whatsoever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nicely done, Pike! Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Coin, Percival, coin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop telling him what to give him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You shut up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make my sister pay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, see. And that way, dear brother, he won't be on the road with lots of gold in his pocket to get stolen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes, we're looking out for his better interests.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are so caring.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I should also mention I don't have any money at the moment, so this is also--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why we have that fabulous crystal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I gave your sister all my money. I did!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Long time ago.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it was a long time ago, but it was all my money.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: About what time is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This conversation is now making me uncomfortable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 10:00 or 11:00 in the morning?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go in to meet our jury?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Wait, can I just ask, because we had three days and I didn't check on it, I had that jewelry box that we stole from the Tylieri house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't ever look in it. Because we just took it and set it aside. And I have this whole thing of jewelry. And I also have a bloody bag of gold and a bag of gems that I never checked in on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can just hand over the bloody bag of gold to Desmond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's look at it first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bloody bag of gold, sifting through it, it contains the equivalent of 230 gold pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bag of gems, it's a few semi-precious stones, but then there are a couple of well-carved sapphires, emeralds, couple of nice gems. The overall worth of that bag probably comes to about 1,200 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome! And then the jewelry box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The jewelry box has largely gold rings, a few gold earrings, the overall worth of the jewelry in there from what you can ascertain given the time that you were spending with it and your experience with having to hock and pawn things that you've acquired over your travels, you could probably sell everything in the jewelry box for about 150 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is any of it, you know, magical?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is purely just a jewelry box for Tylieri's own collection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm keeping the jewelry box, 'cause I want it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It is a nice jewelry box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I'm generous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your greed is endearing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, yeah, let's go to court.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have our, who has our papers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan had them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have some papers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, our diplomat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bust out the mustache?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, wait, did we send anybody ahead with our letters?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, it's probably fine, but I really don't think we should walk up, just in case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's my problem, on a certain level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean, you don't want to walk up to the palace?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The last time we saw Uriel, he was rather awful to us, and I think he's probably fine after we took out the Briarwoods, I think, but I'm not a hundred percent sure and I like my head on its shoulders.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think he would go that far?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially. We did leave town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, it's an unknown quantity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I have some heavy lifting on my shoulders, I'll take a bit of it on now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. We'll just follow behind him and stay at a distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a busy day, being midweek and about noon-time, so it's also nice to be back home where you can hear the classic sound of hoofs clopping on the cobblestone, the shouting of different individuals across the thoroughfare, and you make your way towards the center of the Cloudtop District. As you guys approach the main gate, the guards immediately step in front and as you two approach, "Halt, there! Have you business here in the Cloudtop?" And he looks over at you and goes, "You're Vox Machina. You're not allowed in here, and I'd like to know your business, please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're here to seek an audience, and we would be more than happy to have an escort. This is an audience that the king is going to wish to take.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: C'mon, snitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looks at the both of you, looks past and sees the rest of the group a little ways back, looks at the guard companion at the front of the gate, and goes, "That can be arranged, just no "funny business. The moment you do, this entire district's gonna be down on your head."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have no intention of anything funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good, good." He puts his thumb up, and you hear the chains (rattling) and the portcullis begins to lift that leads into the central area of the Cloudtop District. You guys step back into the familiar area, the streets here much cleaner, the cobblestone much fresher-- this is where the more upper-class and elite of Emon stay, live, and keep most of their business. You make your way through with the two guards flanking you guys, and you can see four more coming down from nearby parts of the wall, and flank you guys from the back to make sure that you're encased and taken care of. As you walk through the streets, what turned out to be an arrival is almost a procession, as individuals are now coming out and seeing this group of you guys walking through the street and peek out. Some of the local nobles and such, some seem to recognize you and go "Oh!" and dart back in. There was a woman you spoke to a couple years ago, it was an older, spinster-type woman who was planning a wedding for her daughter. She waves for a second and goes to talk to you guys real fast, and then one of the guards raises a pike towards her and goes "Mmm."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Later, later. It's going to be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Curious." You are led past the Citrine Garrison, through the central palace, up the front steps that lead to the doorway, the gates that are currently opened. You are led into the central foyer chamber of the central palace, and as you are brought to that point, you can immediately see the guards on the inside step forward and have a whispering conversation with the gentleman--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can read lips.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do they say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Touché.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The conversation entails: "Vox Machina has returned to Emon. They are requesting an audience "with Uriel." The other guard says: "Last bit of documentation we've received was they were to be "arrested on sight." The first says: "I know, I know, but Uriel rescinded that recently. He said "if they show up to bring them in. They don't seem to be aggressive at all. If they're now going to "do anything stupid we could just kill them here, so they know better than to do anything stupid." The other guard person goes: "You're right, but I've seen what they can do. Bring out whoever you "have on shift." And as they step away, "This way, please!" and you can see the guard that was with you splinters off from the rest of the party and as you guys walk down the hallway, a few moments later, about 20 guards begin to come out from the nearby hallways, and follow behind you. And it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see a guard I recognize and I go: "Oh, I got my snake!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he goes: "Oh, ha, yeah, good." And another guy pats him on the shoulder and he puts his spear back in place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See, everything's fine, it's a lovely welcoming party.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm thoroughly impressed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The throne doors open, entering the skylight-- the noonday sun now pouring beams of light into the central chamber. You can see, stepping towards the central dais is Uriel Tal'Dorei, who has not been there previously, and apparently has been recently summoned to the chamber through your arrival. As he steps up and sits in his chair, he notices you guys entering with the guards, and nods his head for a moment and looks off to the side, and approaching him to join him on top of the platform is Seeker Asum, who apparently has returned, with his shaven halfling head, with his tattoos on the side, and Arbiter Brom, the cleric of Ioun who oversaw part of your guys' initial trial here in the castle chambers--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, yeah, yeah, he was under their control, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then after them, you see Guardian Tofor Brotorus, who is the silver-scaled female dragonborn, who is currently the head of the town's guard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tofor, what was her last name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Brotorus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it all written down somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So this is essentially our jury? Judge? Judgment party?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's most of it, from the last time you guys were here, yeah. As you guys are brought forward, the guards stop, and let you continue the rest of your pathway forward, you step up to the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I step up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, is Percival the only one that's gonna step up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stay with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm stepping up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll step up behind you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull her a little further along with me, and we step up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As those of you who wish to then step up to the front of the dais, Uriel sits up and puts his hand out to tell you to stop where you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I genuflect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I follow suit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This build of tension begins to fill the room before he goes: "First and foremost, I owe each and every one of you the deepest apologies. I've "only recently cleared my head of a cloud of poor judgment, one that apparently wasn't one of my own "making." And you can see, he looks genuinely distraught. There's bags under his eyes a little bit, like he hasn't been sleeping well, and you can see one of the servants go: "Shall we bring "Salda?" He says: "No, no, it's all right. When last we spoke, we had a trial, many things that "were brought to our attention. In the time of your absence, in hoping that you would find means of "absolving yourselves of these charges, Seeker Asum here traveled out about to Wildemount to do his "own bit of informatory gathering. He returned about a week ago, and just as I was attempting to "sort out this haze-- Asum, if you would please." And he rests his hands for a second, and Asum steps forward and puts his hood back and closes his hands before him. "First of all, a gracious "welcome to you, Vox Machina and friends. I did my digging in Wildemount, specifically Wynandir and "Port Damali, near the southwest coast of the Shearing Channel. Inquiries by myself and my "gatherers before me revealed that the Briarwoods, while once respected in that community, had been "accused of necromancy about six years before, a practice that had long been outlawed in "Wildemount. Their estate and all lands were to be seized by King Dwendal, but the Briarwoods were "officially killed when their homestead was burned by a mob."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, that is the gist of my findings while you were off in Whitestone. Sovereign." And he steps back, and Uriel raises his head, leaning forward with his elbows on the edge of his knees, still sitting on his throne. "It's also been brought to my attention that the attack within my walls was "indeed instigated by the Briarwoods themselves, and that Sylas is vampiric in nature. This is the "influence that clouded me. This is twice now that I have found myself, in spite of all of my "protections and intents to defend this city, that I have fallen prey to the wills and whims of some "infernal intent. And that is not a way to breed respect or trust in one's leader. I have a lot to "think about. Regardless, let it stand that as of this moment, Vox Machina is immediately returned "to their place on the council, and all charges against them dropped."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. We've also received a bit of word that you were successful in returning Whitestone to "some semblance of new order. Please, if you would."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you would, your majesty, yes, first of all Whitestone is once again ruled by the de Rolo family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is good to know."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I must also, at this point, offer our own apologies which are in order. While there was a supernatural flame of distrust in your heart, it couldn't have been ignited without the embers of our own rash judgements, and poor choices. It is difficult for men of action to necessarily pay attention to the smaller details of their world and their realities, and for this we do apologize. I wish I could say it would be the last of it, but again, it is a difficult world, and we are prone to action, and for that you have our apologies. I would also offer, my lord, that perhaps these infernal powers are attracted by your innate goodness, and that would be worth meditating upon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) Well, if there is the de Rolos still in "rule, then are you to return to Whitestone?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am not. There is another de Rolo. The Briarwoods were sloppy in their extermination of my line and family. Cassandra de Rolo now rules, along with a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Triumvirate?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Triumvirate, I suppose?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Council?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Worth discussing at the very least with the new rulers of Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We will, very much, endeavor to extend as much aid as we can to the rebuilding of "Whitestone. As to the bridge, this may be more of a matter of us working with the powers of "Wildemount, as we were under the impression that that was being handled by the Briarwoods. But we "shall pursue this, as this would still be a great boon to our countryside. Well, thank you, thank "you for coming."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Excuse me, Sovereign Uriel, perhaps I'm speaking out of turn here, and I haven't consulted with my fellows here, but you did mention that you've been mind-controlled twice now, and as council members, this doesn't sit well, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I understand."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, what are we to do? The security that you have in place clearly hasn't worked. Is there a role that we can serve to ensure that you will be further protected?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I may, Vox Machina would not be here today without the aid and advice of Lady Allura, and I would like to personally testify on her behalf of her ability and her wisdom, and her heart. I feel she has a great place in this city, and you should put great trust in her, specifically. She will do much good by you, Sovereign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus they may be able to enchant your crown so it has some, you know, special mind-control fighting abilities.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's spit-balling here, it doesn't have to be that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That could be nice. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is being looked into, as previously was thought that such an enchantment was already "provided. It appears the magic went inert, and a re-enchantment is being looked into. And your "advisement on Allura's great deal of respect, influence, has been noted, as it has for the "entirety of her length here as part of the council. When she returns from Whitestone, I "intend to see that she is properly rewarded and regarded in this forum."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My mother would have said she is a good egg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That she is. That she is."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we hand over the rest of our--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Evidence? Documents for the archives. We did collect quite a bit of paperwork, and documentation that would fill in any of the gaps in the history of Whitestone, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, anything--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course, we gathered this from the palace in Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thumbing through the paperwork. "It's not-- Asum." He hands it over and Asum takes a moment of quiet to himself to thumb through, and he's very carefully inspecting and looking about the edges.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you looking for something specific?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm currently confirming handwriting. One that I deal with quite often."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes, actually, that is something we discovered on our own.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My liege, these papers do appear to be genuine, and that does indeed appear to be the "handwriting of Riskel Daxio."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can hear the clanging of footsteps, heavy footfalls, and weapons and shields banging as they start just scattering about the entire palace around you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hate to be him right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you just say that there's a fort somewhere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fort Daxio?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fort Daxio. It's our northern military post. It's by the Cliffkeep Mountains. Lots of "very dangerous things reside up there, giant creatures, and he holds the border. He's the "adopted father of Riskel, not his actual--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But any connection to this traitor may-- it may be dangerous for him to be in command up there. This whole place could be a risk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I shall look into it. They haven't spoken in quite a long time, and as far as I know there "wasn't a lot of love between the two. Besides, Mikael is not at the Fort right now, Mikael is "down in Syngorn on a diplomatic military mission."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your majesty, I know well the betrayal you feel, and I urge caution.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Caution it is."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't forget about Kibble.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right, I guess we don't need him to testify--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well we should bring him out just to, just 'cause-- Otherwise he just sat around for nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look behind and Desmond is standing behind you all, wide-eyed and so confused and overwhelmed by everything that's happening, and just eagerly awaiting for you to fill him in--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This young man was an unfortunate victim of my wrath when the Briarwoods visited. He is a citizen of Whitestone, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes I was told of this, the carriage-man that you had attacked."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to have him be the official letter carrier for any-- the first set of correspondence to the new rulers of Whitecastle, so since he--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitestone. My god, I'm hungry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no! So if you could send an order of sliders--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: About 12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't forget the mustard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm coming up with this shit. It's not easy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might need some gut healing after those.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would it be reasonable to appoint him as our first correspondence messenger, since he must return home at the very least?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. I would still wish to send him with a few of our trusted soldiers to keep him safe. The "roads are not safe between here and Whitestone in general, and I mean no offense to you, young sir, "but you don't look able with a weapon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Especially not against harpies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I should also mention that my lineage has now been restored to me, and I am now of royal descent once again. And so, again, with my companions' permission, and we will discuss this in the future, but I would like to put forward the beginnings of the proper paperwork to perhaps have Greyskull Keep designated as an embassy, with all the privileges and rights that that presumes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That could, no, that will be arranged."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will confer with my peers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're on Whitestone soil.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we give Desmond his appointment as a royal messenger, which I guess he is, would the kingdom-- he risked much to keep himself alive and possibly to testify on our behalf-- would the kingdom be willing to give him a quick little reward for his time spent in captivity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly. It's only fair. You've travelled this "far and undergone much personal difficulty in aiding us and relieving this darkness in our "territory, and yours as well. I would like to grant upon him by my estate as Sovereign Uriel a "granted gift of 1,000 gold pieces to be sent on his way."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's more than what we would've done by far!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Desmond's like: "I-I--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't faint!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't spend it all in one place, bruh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Desmond? The debt that I owe you is larger than coin, and is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a lot of coins, huh?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's ongoing, so if you can think of how-- what sort of trade you would like to spend your next years of life pursuing, whether it be in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably not lute-playing, I'm gonna just throw that out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Wow. Fucking cold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Drums it is! Drums it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are a terrible person. I'm a terrible person, but you're the worst.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even I am taken aback. My jaw is just open like: (gasps).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeker Asum stifles a chuckle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know what's amazing, Sovereign, is that Vex'ahlia and Percival were just talking earlier today and they promised each other to match whatever you offered this boy, and I am amazed at their generosity and kindness--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk rocks hand him, on the back of his arm, just like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel nods, "That is generous." At which point, two--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever work you would wish, Desmond, is available to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The verbiage comes across as-- actually, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Oh oh! The first whisper of 2016!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Breaking in the new year!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Watch the flask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I'm making this up as I go! I don't know what I'm doing."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Look surprised!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I'm a fraud!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I've got a reddit page open behind my DM screen."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Climbing over a camera. So Uriel's eyes go wide for a moment, nods. "All right." The guards rush back off, and, "Well, if there's anything else, I believe this concludes our "business."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything else we need or require?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're perfectly well-suited for now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Desmond off to Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Desmond nods. "I imagine so."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, Vex'ahlia, you'd best give him that 1,000 gold now--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would right now, but I don't have any on me, how crazy is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh that is such a shame, I know, I almost thought about reminding you to bring your extra--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since I am also gold-poor, I'm writing it into the letter to my sister that we owe money, that they are to employ him in any way he sees fit.

lines.name: MATT
