lines.text: An individual of the Court has just come up and handed him a sack of gold coins and he hasn't even-- he's not listening to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hide it around. Put some in your shorts, put some in your shoes--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, tuck it down by your nuts, eh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He puts some down the front of his pants and pulls his little belt tight. "I-I, um--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keeps it safe, makes a lady take a double look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also made sure in the letter that they know that he is returning to Whitestone with this money, so that if he, somehow-- if it's mismanaged by any of the guards or otherwise that it will be taken care of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is escorted by two of the guards to his temporary chambers here at the palace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Uriel, we'll leave you to your business, but if you need any help finding anyone, we're here for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thinks for a minute. "I know you just returned. You've already done so much. But it has "come to my attention that Riskel Daxio apparently has fled the palace, or at least has not been seen "for a number of days. I've set the guards on it, and Seeker Asum, you as well, see if you can "gather as much information as you can-- but if you find it within your capabilities to seek any "information regarding his whereabouts and possibly bring him to justice, I would be very grateful and "happy to reward for the destruction of this traitor."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. (satisfied laugh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any intelligence that he's still within the city walls, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's only been a few days, so, I haven't, no--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could be anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're trying to find out now. You may move swifter than my guard, if previous experience has "taught me anything." He looks over to some of his guards who are like, what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Ah sir, we're standing right here!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys are doing a great job, you're great, you look great, you're doing great, you're great, thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Man, we ain't found shit."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Guardian Tofor reaches over and says, "My liege, if I might also be excused to "do my own search, I would appreciate that." "But of course, Guardian, please, go on your way." And she scatters off. The rest of the council looks about, and glances at the rest of you. Uriel stands up from his throne, "Very well. Thank you, and you're all dismissed from this council "meeting." And he stands up and begins walking off with Seeker Asum at his side, quickly talking up to him and they're both having this heated discussion as they leave out to the western side of the throne room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any other guards in the room as we leave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are four other guards, two appointed to the front door and there are two at the sides of the central throne.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look at the guards at the door and I go, told ya!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both step back for a minute from the booming voice out of nowhere, and, "Yeah." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so we're free.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That went well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Better than I expected, to be sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wasn't worried. Who are we tracking down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The dickhead that built our frigging keep!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you know, I'm wondering: if I was a sneaky bastard--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not, don't say that about yourself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you so much. I sometimes get concerned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know where you're going with this, you should finish the thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I was a sneaky bastard, and I wanted to make sure--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. And if I were to make sure (laughs) I had an emergency escape route outside of the city, and was maybe tasked to build, I don't know, say, our keep, within the last year, I feel like we need to start at home here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I mean he's built-- he's built a lot, but I assume he's probably built secret entrances into different places.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because our keep is butted up against the border of the city and everywhere else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have the blueprints to Greyskull Keep?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can we get them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They won't be on there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, but being able to study them we might find places where--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're thinking that he's hiding in our keep somewhere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I think he escaped through our keep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or he might have hidden an escape-- there might be things about our keep we don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, could I take a week and really size up the entire building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which building?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The keep. For little sneaky holes that I didn't know were there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get the blueprints just to help.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we even ask where we last saw Riskel whatever?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I search his room? Are we allowed to do that? I mean, he did ask--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can we ask for transparency and information exchange or something like that with these people? So that we can come in and out of the Cloudtop District? Are we cool there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're cool now. Yeah, all the charges have been dropped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're representatives of a foreign government.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Briarwoods wanted something with Emon. That had nothing to do with building a bridge, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did they want?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did they want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeker Asum found information that it seems that the whole bridge conversation--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was like a ruse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a ruse that arose-- well, it arose because he began to send agents into Whitestone to find out what was happening, and he believes they discovered that Emon was now looking at them, and so they reached out to try and distract or prevent them from going any further. So as opposed to being just quiet and accepting this outside attention, they cut it off at the head and went like, "Hey! Let's talk about how we can work together as a way to try and not keep this weird, "constant influx of spies."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the Briarwoods coming to Emon is assumed to be just a formality? That's all they were here for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A distraction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To continue to raise belief in that conversation. It may not be the case, but that was--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But why send-- why would I go? Why would you go? Why not send a representative? You know what I mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you can gain better control.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you can work your magic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Validity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anyway, I want to go check out his room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Riskel was also in charge of security within the palace. And part of the notes that you had received about him talked about discussing back and forth with the Briarwoods in preparation for their arrival, to make sure that most of the magical wards and defenses that were usually set up there were all removed or false.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait a second, so we're gonna go check out his room to see if we can find clues, but also, who would know? Is there anyone that we know who would know-- would Gilmore know where this guy has gone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You just really want to see Gilmore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would Gilmore know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he knows everything about everyone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He just has really nice hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Isn't that the same thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's different from actually knowing things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I honestly think that if Asum doesn't know, nobody knows. Asum is our source of information here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (weak laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's just staring at you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you make your way over to-- (laughs) as you make your way over to Riskel Daxio's room, there are two guards out the front. You can hear things being rummaged around through inside. You can see a couple guards are picking apart his room, and at first glance as you step up, they see you, and the guards step aside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Council members coming through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards stop rummaging as you enter. You can see cabinets and stuff have been pulled out, bedsheets have been turned over. Most of the room appears to have been left untouched, except for most of his belongings-- anything that would have worth is empty. Most of his drawers are empty. You can see already, there is what looks to be a small chest that is open and empty on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm gonna perception check that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gonna perception check the whole room to see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm going to look for secret compartments in the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Investigation, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For investigating these specific things for this purpose, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, 20 for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 19 for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 23 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Inspecting the room, you find-- the chest that you're looking at currently, Vax, it has scrapes on the inside that look like it contained a great sum of money, that was then removed and taken, as if pretty much a large portion of his personal wealth was removed. That's your inspection check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, looking about the room, Vex, you find that the arrangement of the furniture seems to have these glyphs that are inscribed on certain pieces of his furniture that are reminiscent of some of the glyphs that you saw--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In a teleportation circle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, actually, on the ziggurat. There are symbols that are concurrent with some of the writings that you saw inscribed up there. You can't read it, necessarily, and they don't appear to be enchanted by any means, at least not anymore, but there is-- it appears like there was something about this room that was purposely arranged for some sort of arcane purpose.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you gasping about? You sound perturbed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, Pike, do you know anything about--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone who wants to take a shot at arcane, I would recommend those who are proficient, because it's pretty deep knowledge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't do the arcane thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do an arcane check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, me as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog is an expert on all things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20, Grog.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! Natural 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanna see how this pulls together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (confused laugh) I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. As you all sit around and pull forth this chair, there's a broken piece of the-- (laughs) of the bed that was found as part of the guards rummaging through the room. You also see that one of the floorboards that is pulled up has this carved on the bottom element of it. And as you're looking it over, especially, specifically Scanlan, who has seen many things about the world as a bard, and taken in much knowledge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm very well-travelled and very old.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're trying to find out what the connection to this is. You've seen parts of this arrangement before, and while the runes are different, there is something about the way they're arranged that reminds you of something, and Grog, you immediately remember that the last time that your party tried to scry into somewhere that didn't want to be scryed in, and it was either aggressively ousted or prevented from any sort of intrusion--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The beholder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something about this just says, "This room doesn't want you to look at it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, yeah, it's funny, but like the pictures that were on the big shape, right, there's something about it that reminds me with this arrangement of that time that we fought that shit-head beholder. Yeah, like, it doesn't really want us to look in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this like an anti-scrying glyph set?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Having a look at it now that you've been given the guidance from Grog, the all-arcane-seeing barbarian--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His instincts are just right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's just a feral thing, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's very good at finding the memory. But that helps guide you to the knowledge and understanding, and immediately that is it. These glyphs were, while no longer having power because an element of them was taken or damaged in the process, this room was guarded against scrying, very subtly, but essentially preventing anyone from peering into Riskel's private goings-on and anything he was doing within his personal delvings with the Briarwoods was all kept from being peered into.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I know what kind of magic or what kind of magic wielder would have been able to protect this room or design this protection?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty much any caster of a decent, mediocre skill for casting can be done, and it's not a terribly uncommon enchantment, it's just expensive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have any idea when the letters came in to Emon that we were successful?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which ones? You sent different ones at different times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Either or. When did they get them, do we know? Can we find that information?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The letter that you guys had sent that just absolved you of your stuff that you had sealed, that was sent closer to Winter's Crest, and that has not arrived yet. The one that you sent to Allura, regarding the inspection of the ziggurat--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That arrived about a week and a half ago, so-- that arrived a lot sooner because you sent it a lot sooner, and Allura's already left, and apparently has gone to seek some allies to help her--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it's been about three days since they've seen Riskel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About three days, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And did we find anything else, any hidden compartments or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No hidden compartments throughout the room throughout your search, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You step outside of the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wanna do a-- no, outside. Dirt. I want dirt under me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're gonna have to walk out on the actual palace into the courtyard area that's around the front.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, bye, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be right back! I'll be right back, I'm not gonna, I'll be right back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think she has to drop a D. With that expression--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just like the bushes better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a guard outside of the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there are two guards outside of the room, and there are the two guards that have stood back and let you guys go about your business.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we try and shake one down, and ask who was the last person to see him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do we need to shake him down, hey!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because it's what I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know the last time-- who the last person was that saw this gentleman?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as we know, last he was seen was a few days ago. His servant, actually, who's "currently being interrogated, two rooms down, will probably have more information."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the servant's name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This would be--" Hold on, let me pull this up real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guard just keeps notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard goes through all of his notes here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's got two pieces of toilet paper with charcoal on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jeffrey."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Jeffrey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's being interrogated right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I immediately leave the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, let's go do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I follow Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. We'll get there before you get to your place, so. As you're heading down through the palace. You guys go to the next room, and the door's open, and you can see this young man, probably in his early 20s or so, half-elf, his dark hair is pulled back into a very tight ponytail-- go, you got it. He's sat in a chair, currently, not tied up or anything, but there are two guards who are currently shouting at him and currently one's like, "Where'd he go? Have you "seen him? Where'd he go?" And he's, "I'm trying to tell you, he just-- he left three days ago. He "packed up and he left! He walked right out. He said he--" And he looks over and sees you at the doorway. (whimpers)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You two. Leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two guards immediately step away and leave the room. Do you enter with him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good cop, bad cop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so all of you guys follow in after Grog--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog's the good cop. Look at his face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out Craven Edge. And I put it, unsheathed, next to my foot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it slams into the wood, it sinks about an inch, as the blade just slips into the wooden floor. And you can see, you guys, as he pulls it out and sets it to his side, almost like mist off of a very hot, wet surface. You can see shadow just drifting off the blade ever so slightly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, there are those that protect life, and they just left. Now, whatever me and my mates are gonna ask, you're going to answer honestly, or your life will be forfeit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, um. I--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My little mate over here will begin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jeffrey, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jeffrey--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't want to use the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't want him to."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't like to use the sword. It's a lot to clean, there's brains on it. He likes to keep it nice and tidy in here. This isn't even our palace. Don't make him use the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh no. I don't want him to."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just answer the questions. It's totally fine, all right? It's going to be fine. Do you want some water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pipe to smoke or anything? Just anything to relax you, make you feel better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I'm okay."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When was the last time you saw Riskel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be three and a half days ago. He took most of his belongings and packed them up for "a trip. He said he'd be back within a month."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Insight check that bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I will insight check him. That bitch. That did not go well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do it as well. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems to be bewildered, fearful, and not holding back any information. He's just at a point where he doesn't seem quite sure what else to say.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh-oh, sorry, Jeffrey. He's not gonna like using that sword, but it looks like it's coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please don't. No, no, no, no no. No, no, no. You don't have to--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The sword is moving a little, isn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spinning it. Spinning it now. On the tip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Three days he left, he said he'd be gone for a month, I-I don't know where-- he left! "He-he-he walked right out of the Cloudtop District."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where did he say he was gonna go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He didn't tell me. He didn't."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, this is gonna be a hard night for me, I'm gonna have to talk him down from this, he gets so worked up--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just got it clean, I just got it clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jeffrey, please, you're just gonna make more work for me if you-- if he has to behead you right now, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't behead me. I just met a girl, please don't--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I have to open you up to get to 'em I will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, there's no answers to find! I'm empty! I--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jeffrey, Jeffrey, did your boss get any letters that he stowed away anywhere, did he have a safe-keeping place, a secret residence somewhere in the city walls--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He had a chest, but he took everything out, he left. I don't know! I don't know!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he ever regularly travel to anywhere in the walls of the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh-- he um--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk up and stand right next to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I um-- I-I-I-I escorted him once or twice to the-- to the Graveyard District."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where specifically?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh, it was uh. It was a-a tavern-- it was far, far beneath him. I found it curious that he "would attend."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The tavern's name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh, it was um..."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I lay the sword right on the table and look at the reflection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Diamond Nest Tavern! That's the one! The Diamond Nest Tavern! He went there, I assumed "to do what young-ish elven men do when they're in stuffy work. I don't know! I don't know, I didn't "go inside."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How often did he go into the Diamond Nest Tavern?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is our sergeant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not often! A few times every few months."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did it follow some sort of regular schedule or was it just out of the blue?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, not that I recall. He-- every six months or so... uh, a few times recently, in the "past month, but that was, that was all."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel this has been very helpful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, yes, you have been quite helpful... Give us the name of that girl so we can send our condolences to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No no no no no! Please please please don't--" He's just weeping now, openly, like this--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, not on the blade, not on the blade...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a voice in your head go, "No, keep the tears coming."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, are you feeling all right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Yeah. How are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fine. I just want to check in, to see how you're doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, you seem a little pallid all of a sudden. Are you feeling all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jeffrey, is there anything else that might help us in our search for your former employer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whimpering) "Don't kill me." He's lost at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lost. Okay...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The sword is a bit iffy...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, what do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "End its torture. End its measly life."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you see in this room right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can see everything you can see."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? I was saying, can you see in this room right now. Can you see what's happening in this room right now? We are totally intimidating the shit out of-- Jeffrey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whimpering) "Yes!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you see what's happening in the-- (whispering loudly) Shut the fuck up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, what do you think? Should we let him live?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god! You're gonna kill him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh I'm sorry, a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Saving throw?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez Louise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a terrible person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14! For a moment, the shadows begin to surround you, and you feel the urge to push the blade right through his measly little throat. But you see the face. But it's not his face: it's the face of Pike right next to you looking up at you with this--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and you pull yourself out for a second, and the blade comes back instinctively.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heh. It was a show. All right, Jeffrey, you've been very helpful. Change your britches, and don't do bad stuff. And I sheath it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. I won't. Thank you! Thank you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have a good day! And remember, shop at Gilmore's Glorious Goods! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay! I will! I will!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket goes up and licks his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelps)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should give him something. Ah, fuck him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all walk out of there, you hear in the back of your head, Grog, this long, rumbling, deep, unhappy sigh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go check out this tavern, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we should. Maybe get a drink there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. And maybe go to the bathroom there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you guys, you're heading to the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm out in the courtyard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Now getting to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to do a Commune with Nature spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! So.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing) The Age of Aquarius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That got weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is what happens when you spend time on your phone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Commune with Nature. So what are you requesting to know about?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Riskel anywhere in town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're connecting, you feel your mind reach out to the earth itself, to all the plant life that exists beneath and through the cracks of the cobblestones. The few trees that are peppered throughout the city, keeping arduous watch over the goings-on within the city of Emon, and a single thought comes back to you that says, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. I mean, I'm not there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take my second question to focus a little harder and figure out where in town he is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a good idea. Good idea!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your vision casts through and brings towards the outskirts of the Graveyard District. It brings you to a series of buildings, one building in particular, but not within, beneath. And the vision fades.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's at the tavern, right? I mean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or is he a fucking vampire?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vision fades? That's all I got?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. He's beneath the tavern. That tavern--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I get one more question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How and when will I die?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) What is the meaning of life?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I see any type of underground secret tunnels or passageways that lead out of the city? What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a brief vision. There are a number of tunnels that snake underneath the city, many of which are long-collapsed or destroyed. You do know there are a handful that spill out towards the docks, deep beneath the city itself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Smugglers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're hard-pressed to find specific locations, but one of them does seem to drift near the location of the tavern you were previously given a vision of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Cool beans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nature fades from your grasp, and suddenly your consciousness returns to just your simple form of Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah! What!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, we found a lot of information by scaring an innocent boy. We need to go to the Graveyard District for some reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a tavern!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's funny, I found the same thing, but I just meditated for a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not nearly as much fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I'm glad we got things that overlapped, though. That's good, I mean, it corroborates, exactly. Cool. Well, I found good news, Eskil, I mean, Riskel is still in town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? Are you sure?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure. I got-- his essence was floating in nature's ether, and nature told me he was here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where? At the tavern?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the Graveyard District, it seems like he's somewhere-- I saw that-- he's somewhere underground. Also, it looks like there is in fact quite a lot of tunnels and secret passageways that lead out of the city near there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are amazing. Amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike and I spent a bit of time underground in the Graveyard District with the Clasp, I don't know if the Thieves' Guild is connected--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This tavern, the Diamond Nest Tavern was the tavern that contained the secret entrance to the Clasp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We busted in there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we have been, I thought it sounded familiar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, was this the same tavern, is this the one that's got, like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Burt Reynolds?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, is this the one that's also like a whorehouse? Is that that one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't they all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're definitely going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no, this one does not. You've only really been to it at the really wee hours of the morning when no one was there for the most part so you could sneak in and out. You have not been there during its normal operating business hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, after all this conversation, I'd say it's pushing one, two o'clock in the afternoon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's go, plenty of time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's a perfect time to take a break and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was about to get to that. Actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody's about to bust.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody needs to go to the bathroom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. Are you guys heading towards the Graveyard District?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're heading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, guys. We've had a little break here, we're gonna go ahead and hop back into this chaos. So. As the party, Vox Machina, makes their way through Emon, the sun itself pushing towards about 2:30, three o'clock in the afternoon. You make your way towards the Graveyard District, and there to the familiar-- (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait! On the way, can I throw something in here? Halfway there I go: Argh! Oh my foot. Pike! Come here! and I pull her off to the side. We'll catch up, we'll catch up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?! What's wrong with your stupid foot?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take the insults and I wait 'til they all march on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) I take the insults!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take the insults, and I continue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Used to it, used to it. Pike. I had a front row seat to the Briarwoods, and that blade that Grog has now that we have never seen before came off of Sylas Briarwood.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought something was wrong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It makes me nervous. I don't know why other than it looks big and fucking scary. I thought about talking to him myself but he will just kick me in the goolies, so I thought that I would tell you, because I think he would listen to you, he certainly would--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you see the stuff coming off the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it kind of reminded me of Percival's shit, which is why I'm talking to you now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, that makes me stressed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he likes you! Not so much me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll talk to him, and see maybe if... I don't know, I'm gonna check out the sword and see if maybe--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's that sound? Is somebody popping popcorn?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I think they are. I think they're eating popcorn. I can hear it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a street vendor on the way to the tavern that's, yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anyway, that's it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Thanks for letting me know. Fist bump.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (belches)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear Grog belch in the distance and it echoes through the open walkway of the city's streets. Yeah, it's pretty fantastic. You catch up to the party, and you guys make your way to the outside of the Diamond Nest Tavern, a familiar tavern to all of you as you've been here once or some of you twice before. However, during this time, the front doors are open, in the middle of the afternoon, and you can hear from the inside the laughter, bustle and movement of people, and music playing very loudly from the interior, it sounds like various instruments cross-playing and the occasional cheer as glasses and steins clink on the inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna throw up my hood, and I'm gonna pull out my other cloak, the red one, and I'm putting it over Pike, putting the hood over Pike's head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have two extra cloaks? You gave me one and then you have another one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like Dumb and Dumber with the gloves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which cloak are you giving her, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, the Mountebank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And you're keeping which one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The displacer cloak I've been wearing. I just don't want you to be seen.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I invisible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just say yes! Just say yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's Pike? Where did Pike go?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey! Nobody can see me! (clanking noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your features are better hidden by this cloak, just because it's big and not currently designed for someone of your stature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You gotta pull it round your cheeks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was gonna say, what does the clientele of the bar look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A half-orc. Black hair slicked back, well-dressed with a really rough-looking angry chin. Aside from the attire and the dress would look the meanest, and leaning more towards the orc side than the human side, but very well-dressed, with a violin over the chin that looks so tiny by his massive frame, but he's playing away and it is glorious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have we heard of these individuals and these--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've heard whispers from Scanlan long ago about just his travel, but you don't speak--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My troupe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I forgot about Dran.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! We forgot about Dre.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) Dr. Dre! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60 seconds late, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's my troupe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's my troupe!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wanna go say hi?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course I want to go say hi, but I don't want to distract us from our mission.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no, do your shit Scanlan, we'll just look around.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How about you ask to jump in for a tune?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you know, we never get to see you play, Scanlan, not to your full capacity!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I plant my foot firmly into his arse and just shove him towards the two guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't seen them for a while. I don't know how they'll react to seeing me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mind if I jump in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would be an honor! Scanlan Shorthalt, ladies and gentlemen! Jump into the fray!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please, keep the tips flowing for us, and your waitresses!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, the current song comes to a close, they all lift their instruments expectantly and look towards you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's play our old standard. And a oney and a twoey and a oney and a twoey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What instrument do you pull out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vuvuzela.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm gonna pull out the flute, the flute, I'm gonna play the flute for a while. 'Cause I don't wanna, the singer sounds good, I don't wanna rain on her parade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no worries. So you pull out your flute and other gnomish girl with her flute as well gives you a look, and you guys start weaving together this flute duel, almost like Flight of the Bumblebees but two conflicting sides-- Go ahead and make a perform check if you could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something tells me it might not go well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's gonna be great!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go and I get as many ales as I can carry and start handing them to those guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. No worries.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin to build this perpetual symphony of-- it's almost jazz flute almost in this improvisational feel to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (flute noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, have a drink. Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Another whisper. Two whispers!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley is subtly massaging Laura's ass.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: For inspiration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I keep an eye on him and make sure he doesn't-- any of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Gotcha. All right, so. As the song builds, builds, builds, people are cheering and shouting, and you bring the drinks over, Keyleth, and you set them down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can me and the other flutist end with an impossibly long held note?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another perform check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, you both inhale, almost like through eye contact you knew it was coming. Hold, and hold, and you can see her eyes start to get tense and bloodshot, her face starts turning beet red, all the rest of the music stops and everyone just gathers around, the air leaves the room as everyone seems to lean in, and eventually she gives up and exhales and inhales sharply, dizzied by it but still smiling and you can only imagine the blurred romantic tunnel vision she has in your direction, as you carry it for about three seconds more and then end with a trill at the end. The whole room just rouses in cheers and clapping, you can now see coppers and silvers and a few gold are being thrown onto the floor in front of you, there's a small bucket at the base of the small stage platform and Dr. Dranzel then stands up, takes his hat off of the ground next to him, and bows, as the rest of the group bows before as well. You know the drill, you've done this for quite some time. Everyone cheers, a few more drinks, even though you bought rounds for everyone, other people are buying rounds and bringing it up. And it's been a while since you've done a performance of this magnitude, and it makes you feel good, and at that point you feel a hand clasp your shoulder and Dr. Dranzel leans in, "It's good to see you again, Shorthalt. It's been "a while."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes it has, sir, yes it has.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Haven't lost your edge."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a little rusty, but I trust you'll keep me honest through this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Honest? We've always been honest. Come! Drink. Eat with us." And they all put their instruments up, as he says: "We've just finished our set. Let's catch up. It's been some time, I'd "like to hear of your journeys and tell you of some of ours."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely. I'll be back in a while, fellows.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good job, Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh are these, are these your friends?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes, these are my traveling companions and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm his bodyguard. He's very popular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can afford a bodyguard of that magnitude?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I've done quite well, thanks to your tutelage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well great, great, well, come on, you don't all need to stay away! Have your friends "sit with us."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They can join us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly!" He goes and calls over, he goes, "Kaylie, Zed, help me with the tables." And the gnome and the rotund bearded human rush off and start grabbing a couple of the tables and they cram them in the corner, so now you basically have built this monopoly on the far corner of the tavern now, where all of you guys can sit around and cluster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kaylie, that was some fine playing. I might have a tip or two about breath control.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry, not all of us are quite as old and seasoned as the others." (jeering and laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I've learned quite a thing or two in my years and, it might interest you to take a little private tutoring session sometime.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Scanlan Shorthalt. You know, I've heard quite a bit about you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My legend is spread far and wide, I'm sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed. And I know better than most ladies that may cross your path."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, a little help over here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You had us, and then you lost us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I give him inspiration? Somehow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do to make Scanlan look better in this circumstance?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps help him with his pitch.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's lovely to meet you anyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex once helped Grog in a very specific way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will-- the man, the myth, and the legend, is true. So, in case you wanted to find out-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you a look over, looks over at Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: MATT "A holy woman?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what I'm doing here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She actually at that point goes (laughs), turns around, "Doctor! You weren't kidding. This "one's certainly a card." And she gives you a wink, and passes a drink your way across the table. As the crowd simmers down, people go back about their business, and the drinks are brought to the table and scattered about, the rest of you find your seats, and sitting around, they gather up the coin that was taken, and Kent, who sits down next to Dr. Dranzel, looks over and says: "Ah, it's been a "while, Scanlan. I'm glad to see you. Glad you could join us. It was like old times. It was nice."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "It was nice. What have you fellows been doing for these years?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dranzel kicks in and says, "Emon, these days, seems to be doing all right. Paid us well for our "time here and, well, you've earned a little coin yourself from this." And he takes a little handful of coins from the pile they had amassed and chucks it over your way. It's like 25 gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well, thank you, but I can't possibly accept this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just playing here for the night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dranzel, and you see spill out a much larger collection of coppers, silver, rings, bits of jewelry, a few loose coin purses, and Dr. Dranzel reaches over and pats him on the head. "Good boy, Samson, good boy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice haul, Samson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks," and he looks about awkwardly and expectantly and---

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still up to the old tricks, I see, Doctor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kaylie takes it. Kaylie, who at this point has been introduced as the gnomish girl who you saw her grabbing the table. She takes the satchel and whisks her hand for a moment and the satchel just vanishes in her grasp in a little puff of smoke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like this girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Huh. So the company you're keeping seems to be formidable."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What can we call you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We call ourselves Vox Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sounds really formal."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) You can call us The S.H.I.T.s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like that much better!" (laughter) "That's the Scanlan I know. Shits it is. So, Shits, what do you do? What's your trade? What are "you tugging around with this sorry sap for?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're powerful warriors, killers, assassins, magic wielders. Not quite as ornery as a bunch as musicians, but still pretty amazing people. We've had quite a few adventures the past few years.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan's a kingslayer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He might not believe you or really anything about me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You doubt the cube?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There aren't a lot of kings in these lands.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But there's one fewer now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "All right, Kingslayer. So I take it you're all experienced in a little skullduggery "from time to time, yes?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, it doesn't mean what you think it means.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're thinking of shoving off. We recently got a tip, if you're interested. Word came about "about a dickhead with too much change in his basement---"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Are you leaning on something, Doctor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. I'm leaning on the back of a chair that I see in my imagination. (shouts) It's my window! Go with it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got it, I got it, I got it! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a very short man, right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's in a cast. He's been playing with a cast the entire time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards the back of the tavern, there's a small wooden thing. He's lounging, he's a casual guy, the Doctor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: His name is Jonathon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It is Doctor Dranzel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A tip about a dickhead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Word came about a dickhead who has too much change in his basement. It's weighing down his "personality. You wanna help this poor old withered man alleviate this burden?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean steal from him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! I mean, help it go to good hard-working folk who deserve it more."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of a dickhead is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't dealt with him personally. People have told me he's a bit of a thorn in the side of, "well, any lively folk. Especially those of an artistic persuasion."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't know the name. But I know where he lives. We've looked at the place, cased it if you "will. There could be a few ways in. Unfortunately, we've become a little higher profile during our "stay here than we expected and I don't know if we're quite as skilled in the realm of shadow-walking."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doctor, we're quite skilled but we have a bit of a name for ourselves as well. I'm afraid we may not be able to help you out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're quite the opposite of low profile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, not to worry. Figured I'd pass it your way."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we were to pursue it, what would your take be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, based on a finder's fee, and based on the relationship we've had all these years, our "troupe would be happy to take a 40% cut."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And this is a vast sum of money we might find?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know I don't like to include outsiders so regularly."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we could investigate, if you give us an address or description.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, all right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I haven't been paying close attention, but who is this mark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He didn't say his name.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What district does he live in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no. The old man wants to redistribute his wealth and we would be the vessel by which he would do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've got a smart bodyguard on your hands, too! (laughs) What's your name?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a good name. Yeah. Speaks of intelligence."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, that's a good insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Secrets, secrets.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get secrets!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, thank you for being my wingman back there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're welcome, but how come you never told us about Dr. Dranzel? Did you forget about him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I told you--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you forget about Dr. Dranzel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is my favorite thing ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But no worries."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're just, out of the good of your heart, wanting to redistribute a little bit of funds to help out a few less fortunate people, that's all you have in this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're all rather less fortunate than this dickhead, and I don't see why a little off his "table wouldn't even be noticed, probably."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And where exactly did you find this information? On this dickhead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think he said he asked him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You asked him? What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no the old man asked him: oh, I need to redistribute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have my reasons, my connections, my friends here, and I've been told that his estate has been abandoned for some time, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, this is an old friend of mine, who I trust very much. He saved me when I was troubled and taught me much about the ways of performing and charming. He has my full trust.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dranzel. So--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take that as a compliment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're welcome. Forgive me if I'm--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dranzel here-- may I call you Dr. Dranzel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You may."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I call you Dr. Dra?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That has a really nice ring to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just Doctor is fine."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Professor Dranzel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes? Doctor. Doctor."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dr. Dranzel, and I want to know if you're really a doctor later, but I think, perhaps, maybe there's a little tidbit of information about this that you're holding back with because-- I would understand. We're new. We don't really know each other. We're not really on that friendship level yet, but my point is, we could be friends like that. We could be-- I'm trying to see if this works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what I'm doing. I'm attempting Friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, interesting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm attempting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, okay. Good to know this. All right, then. What saving throw does he get for that one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get advantage on charisma rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, right, right. Okay, okay. Yep, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I just rolling charisma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're rolling a persuasion with advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, persuasion roll with advantage. Oh, that's nice. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He looks to you and goes, "We don't know who it is. We've been told it's in the "Cloudtop District. It's a red brick building. It's been abandoned for over a year and apparently it's "been well boarded up. But from what I've been told, quite a lot of wealth is down there. But "it's a bit dangerous of an entry. We have no way of getting into the Cloudtop, but these myths keep "finding our ears."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's the house that I think it is, it's already been--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pillaged?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pillaged. Pillaged is a good word. The rumors were not incorrect but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What house is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you remember with the agon-day with our utler-bay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't speak Latin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty sure it's already been cleaned out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's unfortunate."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless you're hearing things we don't know about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know that a few individuals have tried to make their way in. Came out with hefty sums of "gold but seemed to be a bit spooked."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm Scanlan's friend, Craig.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello, Greg. All right, Craig."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll definitely be able to help you with this, but I'm not going to do anything unless I know something more, so if you want to go into the house, if you want me to break us into the house, which I can certainly do, I really need to know a little bit more. Your chances of getting whatever you're after inside raise if you're honest with me. And I don't feel yet like you're being honest with me, so I want to help you, but I don't think I can and without me, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, but we're not getting in the house, so is there anything else you wanna tell me about--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all I know. All I know is they've had a few other of the thieving persuasion have "made their way in before and they came out with a decent chunk of change, given that they could only "be in there for a short time."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna insight check. That is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's hard to read, but the best you can tell is he's been pretty clear with you. And at this point as you're looking at him, his eyes go--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this is the point where I buy you a beer. And I put the coin down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "You're a tricky one. All right, you've got yourself some talented compadres."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, they can't play as well as you, but they're pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're interested in finding your way in and come out with anything, we'll be here about "another week."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. How long have you been here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably been here about two weeks now. Two and a half weeks."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm. Have you noticed-- I'm sure you've seen many people come in and out, but an older gentleman dressed much nicer than he should be in an establishment like this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You describe Riskel to him? Riskel's elven. Thin features, older. Has some battle scars, but long-ish hair kept behind his ears. And as you describe it, he goes, "Yes, yes actually. We had a gentleman like that who came in here a couple of times about a week "ago, and last saw a few days ago."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A few days ago?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah! He came in and watched one of our performances. Tipped us rather well!" (chuckles)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Seemed a bit hurried."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Did you see where he went?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I assumed he was staying here at the tavern."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? Are there rooms here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. Just upstairs, they have rooms here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should see if there's rooms downstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I get up and leave the table and go talk to the barkeep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you guys want us to create some sort of distraction while you go search the place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to talk to the barkeep and talk about rooms, potentially, first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just seeing what they have available, and what's being rented right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we know he's downstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say, he was going to go downstairs. I'll go with Team Downstairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Team Downstairs it is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Team Downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you head to the barkeep, you see a dwarven woman wearing a simple blouse, but pulled up past the elbows. She's currently wiping down part of the front-- you can see her hair is pulled up to a ponytail that drifts past her shoulders down to the center of her chest. She glances up to you as you approach. "Hi, so what can I get you, dear?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi. You have rooms, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have rooms, aye. We only got one currently not occupied."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have an older gentleman? Elven, battle scars-- I describe him-- staying here right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No? No, I haven't seen someone like that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Insight-check her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay. 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? Her demeanor has changed, and she has gotten guarded. "Nope, haven't seen anyone like "that here. Sorry! No. A lot of patrons coming through."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. So many people come in and out. It would be so easy to lose sight of somebody like that who came in. I put five gold pieces onto the countertop. It sure would be wonderful if you could remember anything about him being here, however.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes her cloth that she's wiping the counter with, and wipes over and pushes the gold coins towards you. Pulls back and goes, "Sorry, dear. I can't help you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk up by my sister, and where the woman just wiped that away, I take a piece of chalk out of my pocket and write thieves' cant-- not the word "thieves' cant"-- I use the thieves' cant on the bar and say, in that language: there is a threat here. I can help you deal with it. And that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Persuasion, you said? 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks at it. Looks at you. Still holding her cloth, wipes it clean from the bar pretty quickly. (quietly) "You one of them? Kitchen storage room. Under the rice and grain barrels." (louder) "Sorry! Can't help you. That's unfortunate."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Completely understandable. Thank you for your time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, of course."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to have a talk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's all meet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, could you have your wonderful friends create a distraction?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can help them create one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just enough so we can slip unnoticed downstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on. He's downstairs. Underground. Do we think maybe he's a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, because that would be very complicated to deal with while still being part of the political infrastructure of the city here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen Riskel around in daylight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Done!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, Grog, it's true. He's a vampire. Could we please meet in a booth in the corner of the pub, please? We need to talk now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excuse us, lovely fellows, we have prior business. We'll be talking again very soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly hope so."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't be 100% sure, but we are sitting atop the thieves' guild. Pike and I have been here before--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've been here. We've barged in here before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Underneath here is a honeycomb of thieves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps excitedly) Honeycomb! Oh, of thieves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think our man is downstairs. They've given me the way in. But it's not going to be easy, it's not just an empty basement. We're sitting on top of the thieves' guild. This is the Clasp!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, why do we have to-- why is it dangerous? Why can't we just go in and ask for him and get him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't you part of them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can-- Yes. I should take point. I'm just saying we're not going down into an empty grain cellar to kill a bunch of rats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So do we think that the Clasp is protecting Riskel? Is that what we're assuming?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's possible. For money, anything is possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well good to know, but we're still going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aren't you still-- I look at your hand-- don't you have the mark?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's complicated. Where did she say to go? It was through the kitchen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She said through the kitchen storage room, on the left. And the mark is actually at the middle of his--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, that's what I mean. I've seen it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your memory is like an iron trap!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you guys should go. Right away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys? Where are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll follow close behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to go into the kitchen. We're going to go two minutes apart, all right? Don't all go in a crowd. I'm going to go in first. I'll see you in there. And then I walk--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I walk over to Kaylie. And I say: my dear Kaylie, I'm sorry if we got off on a weird foot. I have that effect on people sometimes, especially--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your feet are weird? That's interesting."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chuckles) Especially lovely-to-look-at young ladies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Smaller than I expected, those feet!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know what they say."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you win, I'll give you whatever's in my purse. And if I win, I get a kiss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I'm one for fun at the very least. It's a deal." (spits loudly)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys shake on it. Are you waiting until sundown, or are you doing it now--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're going-- Oh, are we waiting until sundown? Is that what's happening?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in the kitchen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen! Boys and girls! The first ever flaute-off? Flutist-off? Flute duel! Featuring me! Scanlan Shorthalt! And you, Kaylie...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kaylie's fine."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kaylie's Fine, everyone! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the folks around are like-- some seem disinterested by it, and some clap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All eyes up here! It'll be a great show!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Dr. Dranzel is like: "Hah! Well, this will be interesting!" And he's still sitting back, watching. You guys are going in first, you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I already went in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (quietly) She told me to go in! So that's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You seem to slip in. And there are two individuals currently running the kitchen. There's the smell of food, but there are no meals currently being cooked. They're just talking to each other. They don't even notice you slip by.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put my hood up before I head back that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Make a stealth check?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) Oh no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I follow them! No, just kidding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I get advantage. Yeah! 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25? Same thing. You guys turn around to the left of the kitchen. There is a small stairway that goes down about five feet into the storage room, where you find your brother. And this is all very familiar to you. You've been here once before. This is where you guys exited the guild on the way out, a long time ago. And there are a series of crates and stuff. But in the far back corner, there are two sacks that are labeled "rice" and "grain", that are leaned up against each other. So we'll get to you guys in just a moment. Who is next up after you guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After they go, I call back to the kitchen and I say: to choose the first song will be the lovely gentlemen who have prepared our food for the evening! Please come out here and choose a song for us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone looks over and one gentleman stands up and--yells out into the kitchen--is like: "Hey! "You're picking the song, mates!" Then you see two folks come out. One's an older woman, wrinkled face, hair's a bit tattered, but she seems happy and smiling amongst her-- happy lines are all throughout her face. The other one's a younger guy. Probably, looking at the features, related to her, who's helping her out in the kitchen. And they both step out, confounded. "What's going on?" "Well yes, what's going on?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just pick us a song, any song! Everyone, give a round of applause to your cooks for the evening!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I grab Keyleth and we slip behind them and into the kitchen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Stealth checks from both of you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! The distraction was helpful! So you guys slip past, seemingly unnoticed. Everyone's attention is on them, currently. And they both look at each other, and she goes, "I, um. Could "you-- Flute, you say?" Takes some popcorn from her pouch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Oh, yeah, she's-- Weird place to put popcorn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a busy kitchen! Could you sing Clouds Upon the Horizon? That was my favorite as a girl!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have an earring on? Scanlan, I need you to make an ode to the kitchen staff. Could you call the kitchen staff out and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did already! I did already!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You called the kitchen staff out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! They're the ones who are suggesting the song!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, really? We've just been in-- in the back-- in that downstairs room where we didn't know!? Well, we're in a separate room!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep! There you go! (chuckles)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good thought! I had the same one!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody else: come now, come now, come now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys head down. Make stealth checks for both of you. That's going to be disadvantage on you, Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and... Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coming down with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A bear!?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Really? Every tool has its place.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine?!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on! What else is it gonna be with a disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After the-- You're really bringing Trinket down there with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that bad? What else--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling) Yes, it's bad! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all are waiting, you guys start heading around. And as you're scooting around the kitchen staff, Trinket, who is currently out front, sees everyone scooting around and disappearing into the back. Leaning his head into the tavern, goes, (bear grunt) and begins walking into the tavern. Other patrons start like (startled exclamations), then like, "Bear! Bear, "bear!" And other individuals start standing up and seeing this bear come lumbering through the tavern, towards the kitchen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. I hear it. I come out of the kitchen very sneakily. Oh! Oh, my bear! I've been looking everywhere for you. Trinket!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Story of my life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing in this tavern! Oh, dear! We should probably head outside! You and me, Trinket!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got two minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. I tell him-- Oh! Oh no, that's so sad! But I tell him to head back to the keep, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the keep, or just outside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the keep! 'Cause what else? He can't just hang out without us there!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe he could stay out there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While she's doing this bullshit, I'm going to make sure that the rice bags and everything are not trapped. Is there a clear stairways down, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bags. You go to lift them, expecting them to be very heavy. They're actually filled with something much lighter. They're false-filled, and they actually move out of the way very quickly. And there is this similar hatch that you guys have come through before. It's about five by five foot wide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I check for traps. Check for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So mayhaps with the bear entering, there is enough of a distraction for one suit of armor to clankily make its way down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were caught in the attention with Trinket, at the same time. So you guys were in the middle of the fray, as you were walking past. As you're bringing Trinket out, the attention is pulled away. I want you guys to make another stealth check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog? You have disadvantage on this one now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck. Ugh. Same rolls. Exact same rolls.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys walk past. As you're stepping into the kitchen, you hear the voice of one of the staff, "Excuse me! Excuse me! You can't be back here! This is our kitchen, we're trying--"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm gonna throw up! I'm gonna throw up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, she had a lot to drink!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've had so much to drink!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You had a lot to drink, be careful. Yeah, she's going to spew!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take it outside! Don't do it in our kitchen!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I need a pan, or something!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's got infectious diseases too! When she spews, everybody catches it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have the consumption.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, make a deception check. (chuckles) I'll say with advantage, since Grog is aiding you in this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Perception or persuasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, deception.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, deception, deception.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Deception? Fuck, come on. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, because Grog's helping you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, gnome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, hork like you mean it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guy is like, "Oh, no. No! Not in here! Um! Right there!" and he points to a doorway on the other side of the kitchen that leads to the alleyway. And he's like, "Out there! No, go. Go!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just start running. I just start running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You run and you open the door out into the alleyway. Grog follows you out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I lead Trinket outside and I see them come out the alleyway!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, if you go around the side, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah. So I have Trinket hang out in the alley and stay there and wait for us. Be safe, Trinket! If any danger comes your way, intimidate them and run the other direction. Go home. I love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket just lies there with his head on his paws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys are evil for making me leave him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there are still two cooks in the kitchen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, one cook has come back in and is currently watching her pretend to vomit in the alleyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a 25 when I checked for traps a few minutes ago?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, thank you. There are no traps on this door, but it is locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I don't know what's down there, but let me take the lead because I've dealt with this before. I don't crouch down or anything, I just start-- still quietly-- but I just walk. Head held high, walking down the stairs. Motioning everyone to follow who's here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're doing this, you begin your "flaute-off"? I don't know. Roll performance!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I rolling for performance? 28.

lines.name: SAM
