lines.text: I perform very well. (singing) Too many cooks!

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Too many cooks! (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (moans) Oh, don't get it in my head!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once I can get the ad off here. So, as you pull out your flute and you prepare for this wondrous--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this Jethro Tull?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes! Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's get to the good part here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a good part?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the whole album.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was just one big, full album. The song was a whole album.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, and as the band picks up behind you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Dr. Dra!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dr. Dranzel picks up his instruments and you guys start playing back and forth with your flutes just picking off-- improvising off of the classic! (laughs) Make another perform check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everybody give it up for Zed on drums! 24!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Kaylie is trying to keep up and you can see her face starting to go red. But she's determined on this, and she continues pushing this into an improvisational flurry of notes that completely walks around your performance, previously done. And you find yourself having to take a step back as she begins stepping up onto the table. And now, even at her gnomish height, is looking over the entire crowd, as people-- who were not previously as interested-- are starting to turn around and look towards you two play.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another performance check, with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With advantage? Not as good, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't believe the Jethro Tull song with no flutes was the one you happened to find!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a ballad! She chose a ballad!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have the best of Jethro Tull over there, or what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently all Jethro Tull songs don't have any flute in them! Failure. Big failure on that part.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just play the scene from Anchorman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You failed me, Tull! Failed me! A great moment ruined by your inability to play a flute in your own album! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jethro Tull would be a great name for a Sith.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: It would!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Careful, careful, I'm still raw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw. Anyway, as it crescendos and crescendos-- What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22! You can see, now, the volume of her flute playing begins to pull back, as you begin to step up onto the same table next to her. Twice as high now, with the illusionary Scanlan above you, almost like those awkward middle school superimposed photos of yourself in the upper corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And lasers in the background?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys, make one more stealth check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all doing stealth checks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, just me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is fucking going on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got 18.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We don't have an extra roll? It is what it is. I have a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What did you get?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe he'll think it's cymbals or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thanks to the music, the clanking is over--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about I pick up Pike with my 20, and I carry her in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! Still works out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Minimal clank.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plank. Hold your abs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as the music picks up and swells, at this point, make one final performance check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27. With this note, you bring once again, this same duel you guys had when you first entered the tavern, and you and Kaylie are facing off, looking directly at each other, furiously going on your flutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blowing at each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eyes locked, tapping your feet heavily against the actual wood to the table. The rhythmic pounding of your feet and the drums-- because the entire room now also slamming their tables in with it as the music builds and builds until eventually you both take one deep breath and go for that same sustained note a second time. She's challenging you at the game she lost last time, and the two of you both swell into this cacophonous spray of music that hits this one final note that pierces through and all the slamming stops, and everyone just waits to hear how long it will go. It carries and carries and carries. The breath never seems to end. Roll another performance roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 22, but I'm going to let her win.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could win this, if you want to, but are you going to let her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With a wink, I end my note.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the flute leaves your lips and you go into a fake gasp of air, she finishes on a high, piercing tune, a trill, and then finishes off, carrying the flute away with a smile as your illusion fades.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen, Kaylie's Fine! Ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're good, but I'm better."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I tip my hat to her and say, yes ma'am. It seems that tonight, you are. All right, I kick her 100 gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You said your purse."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she going to inspect it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach over. Are you going to start thumbing through your purse and pulling out gold? She goes, "No, your purse. You bet your purse."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, that was a figure of speech, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You totally let her win and you're going to give her all your money?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He forgot about that part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dranzel goes, "I did hear you say a full purse."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I hope there's so much money in that bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A deal is a deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The things you do for women.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do not give her your money!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Scanlan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there was a piece of advice that ever lived.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I untie the purse and I hand it over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you take any of the gold out secretly before you hand it over to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Such a life lesson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes it. How much was in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let it be known throughout this tavern that "Scanlan Shorthalt is a man of his word."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, my dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes the chain purse and flicks it away. It vanishes in a puff of smoke. She goes, "That's a lot of coin."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get around a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps we'll have a drink later." And she steps off the table. Now the rest of you have all made your way down into the storage chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anything we encounter is far easier than what just happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to cry? Because I would want to cry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Money means nothing to me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should somebody pickpocket her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck yeah, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to join them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, of course!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait. Oh yes, I still have to sneak back there, don't I? I just go invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you step under one of the nearby tables and come out, completely invisible. You make your way, stepping through the kitchen, downstairs and find that you currently, right now-- Vax, you are going to unlock the latch, you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I was just thinking of Wendydoodle's art from the comic. Yeah, yeah, I'm going to check that door for traps, is what I'm going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, perception check. Wait, you checked earlier, there's no traps. There's just a lock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you were giving me another door. Yeah, 25 up top where the fake bags of rice were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but it was still locked, you didn't roll to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To pick it, sure, that's no problem. It is a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, it's a little tough, you just manage to get it up and it comes off and the latch-- pretty solid still.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Amateurs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you open the (creaks) leads down below and you find yourself looking down into a familiar stairway that leads into darkness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I know sometimes I can seem like I'm an idiot, but let me do the talking, yeah? And then I start down and lead the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, as you push down the stairway, we're doing marching order here just so we have it. So we have currently, you're at the front, who's behind Vax?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right Vex, you're behind him. Who's behind Vex?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm up next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, now, Scanlan, Pike, Grog, who's up next?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, do we roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just let me-- Who wants to go after Keyleth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm probably in the back since I was the last to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Scanlan will be in the back and then probably Grog next to him and Pike right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He made a little rainbow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it is a rainbow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so pretty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They can't see it because it's off; they won't be able to see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a reason for that. All right, so, as you step down, the wood creaking with every here-and-there step. It stops, switches back, and then heads down further. You can see that this area of the room is mostly completed in construction, but a portion of this has been rebuilt. If you recall, last time you guys exited, part of this exit was destroyed. It has been reconstructed and there at the bottom of the stairway is a thick wooden door, wrapped in iron bars or strips of iron to keep it nice and taut and strong, and you can immediately see five locks down the side of the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody hold up for a second, could we crowd-surf the bard up to us at the front please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, is that me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The bard, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, toss me forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not really getting his meaning, I grab him by the back of the shirt and I just chuck him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Being at the bottom of a stairway, I want you to make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Oh, acrobatics, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Scanlan (boof) on the ground right next to you, thankfully just missing the bottom stair, which would have hurt even worse in the back, but through the slight toss you take six points of damage. The fall. A real crick in your back in your back in your shoulder from the impact. You get up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks Grog, thanks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna scoop a hand under his head and give him a slap on both sides.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (huffs) What are we looking at?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen to me. I'm gonna try to do the talking in here, because I know these people a little. But if that fails, I need you. All right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You-- me? Yes, just do my thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need you on ice for a little while, all right, so just stay between me and my sister.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Yes, yes, sir.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five locks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five locks, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to perception check for traps and for Thieves' Cant and anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all right, 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each one is a different language. What languages do you speak?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I speak Elvish, Common, Abyssal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You speak the same languages as me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like you grew up together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I also speak Undercommon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking at it, Abyssal-- you do recognize two of them, and it's the top one and the bottom one. And both of them, the equivalent in Common would be a phrase like: enter, or pass.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is one of them in Underdark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No Undercommon, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Draconic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Underdark would be Undercommon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Celestial? Elven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing in Elven.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dwarvish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a Dwarvish one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, oh! I have a Belt of Dwarvenkind that lets me read Dwarvish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But that's okay, Pike can read Dwarvish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It sounds like the Abyssal ones are the ones that you have to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's five of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but those say 'enter'.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know what the other ones say, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. There is the one in the middle, is in Dwarven. The two of you recognize it. You walk up and say: that's Dwarven, but that's as far as you actually understand. You know it's Dwarven. Go ahead and make an intelligence check, just go for it. Roll a d20 and add your modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a negative two modifier? (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You-- It's Dwarvish. You know Dwarvish?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Coming up behind Grog and you whisper to him and let him have the moment. You recognize the rune and it's the Common equivalent of entry, enter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: None of them are in Elvish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, none of them are in Elvish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sylvan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no Elvish whatsoever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This word in Dwarvish means "gentry".

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does anyone know Goblin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you know Goblin, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I fucking hate goblins, that doesn't mean I know their language.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And does anyone know Primordial?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know Primordial?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fourth one on the bottom. You have the top one and the bottom one, which you read. The middle one in Dwarvish, which you guys read. The fourth one is a Primordial phrase that says the equivalent, and it is a language of guttural, elemental sounds. It is a no, a stop, a general halt type.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. Don't do that lock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we that leaves one left and we don't know what says. There's no Thieves' Cant on this door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wait, the top one is a yes. The middle one is a yes. The bottom one is a yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second one down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second one down you do know, that's the one that says no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The B-slot we don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So all together there's five locks and we know four of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know four of them, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there any way to try to figure out what it says?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Outside of not knowing the language or any magical means that would allow you to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I look at the two in Abyssal. They say 'entry', is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I already checked for traps and there were no traps, just locks

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have not checked for traps on this one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I need to check each lock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you just check the two that are unknown to us, that are negative?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want an enhancement of your abilities?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. You use dexterity, right? I give him Cat's Grace? I cast Enhance Ability on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're making this shit up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So Keyleth reaches out and you feel your form become even more-- So you have advantage now on dexterity checks for as long as she remains concentration on the spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we got Abyssal, Abyssal, Dwarven in the middle and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Primordial on the second to last.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the Primordial says no, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Abyssals say yes and the Dwarven said what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. They all say enter, entry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I want to try to pick the three that I know. Two Abyssals and the Dwarven say entry. And I have advantage on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you check for traps?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did. I checked for traps, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're rolling right now to check for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm rolling right now to check for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the top is Abyssal. Here I go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The top one is locked, but it is not trapped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go for the middle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm gonna unlock that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. With advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four, so that's okay. This is lock-pick, right? 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (creaks)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I'm gonna go down to the bottom, to the Abyssal at the bottom. Checking for traps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have advantage on checking for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I thought you said I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, for making the checks you do. This is for dexterity, checking for traps is a perception roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception's 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Bottom one, not trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Dwarven in the middle. Checking for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one is also not trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. That's three, the fourth one was Primordial.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and don't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one is trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the Primordial said no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. In their language it's pronounced huh-gluf.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But what does it mean? We've got three traps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the fuck is wrong with you? The ones that say no are trapped! How is this hard to understand?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 26, the last one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second one? The one that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That we don't know what it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen scribbles like this before. It appears to be some sort of goblinoid language but none of you actually understand what it says. Does appear to be trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does appear to be trapped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about you don't unlock those ones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, don't tell him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not alone, and this affects you, asshole.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Unlock the ones that are not trapped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You already popped the top lock and nothing happened, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So there's two that are trapped. I'm going to attempt to disarm the two that are trapped.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This affects you, you dark sword-wielding dick!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm serious, you had a good thought!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would you do that? Do the ones that aren't trapped first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody wait, wait, wait, wait. Everybody please walk up the stairs ten feet, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, walk up the stairs. Ten feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm walking away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're all gonna see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna try to open the door, you little asshole. But I don't want you to get burned while I get burned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I won't be burned because you're not gonna mess with the traps! Just do the ones that aren't trapped!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk forward and I grab Scanlan and everybody and I back everybody up ten feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try the ones that aren't trapped first, please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'm gonna quickly inspire him. I'm gonna read him a limerick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I knew a goliath in Whitestone Who lived in a very, very fine home 'Til one day a wizard, or maybe a large lizard Burned it and left him alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So of the five at the top and the bottom and the middle, it's Abyssal, Abyssal, Dwarven. And I checked those for traps and there aren't any so I'm gonna unlock them, all right. So for the top one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did the top already.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check for traps or?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: You unlocked it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You unlocked the top one. And the latch came open without a problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do the middle one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I use what I just rolled for the middle one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make sure you disarm the other two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's too many people talking, I don't know what's going on. I don't know what's going on. Yeah, I just rolled a ten twice, and that's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (creaking)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now the bottom one-- shush!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. (laughs) 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29. The bottom one you-- It's a different type of latch that's actually a rod that pushes into the door. You manage to find a break in the wood where it's split and you put an instrument and you pull the latch open. So those three are now currently unlocked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try pushing the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So here's where we don't know what's going on. We got number one, number three, and number five are untrapped, unlocked. Number two and number four are trapped, but I'm just pushing the door open?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do whatever you want to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I don't have to make the decision on my own, because you're all ten feet away from me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try disarming them, sure, why not? Do your thing

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Follow your heart, don't blow up your head to solve those fucking locks. Do it, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got advantage, so why not, fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax. What is your choice? What do you wish to do in this moment? You have three untrapped locks open, two locks that seem to be trapped. One of which said no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm gonna open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems they were both false locks and as the door opens you get the feeling that perhaps the traps were based on the attempt to pick them, or disarm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, good job, brother.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: High five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No high fives.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just maybe-- just like a touch then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the left of where you currently are, the hallway continues into darkness and turns around the corner into shadow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so there was a cell that we were in, and there was a larger room where we were surrounded by Modeth and a lot of people.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But there were a lot of hallways

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we smell anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You smell the residue of burnt wood and tinder. Nothing beyond that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any tracks that look like they could have been from an elf, an old guy with some battle scars.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I could do those too. Can I help her with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Sorry, her ranger tracking training is far beyond anything you as a barbarian have attempted. Though you are good at tracking naturally as a barbarian, you could attempt to make a roll on your own. But it wouldn't be helping her with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking about the stone floor, you do see scuff marks and where dust has been pushed aside by boots. Many footfalls have come through this area, but there's no way to really ascertain any recent traffic or direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would have had to roll a 20, I bet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While we're waiting, I'm gonna throw my hood over one shoulder and I'm gonna undo my sleeves so that-- Oh, the Clasp is back here, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just take your shirt off. Show it to the world. I'm gonna cast Pass without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, are there two different directions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so the right or the left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I ascertain if there's any type of draft or any--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival already tried that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you already tried?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, here's what I'm thinking. I mean, we could sneak through here and this one's going to sound like a herd of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not necessarily. I just cast Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't disparage her, she's wonderful and beautiful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our chances of sneaking through here are low. I could try to talk us through. This guy's a threat to them because the kingdom wants him and they're housing him. And that is not really financially viable. So I feel like perhaps we talk our way out of this. We don't have to go in banging an evil sword, not that we have one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're down here, obviously we belong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I belong. And I will vouch for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beautiful. Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I definitely would rather not fight the entire thieves' guild.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not sneaking, then? 'Cause if we did sneak, we could-- Don't you have Fly or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're in a very thin hallway right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All she'd have to do is fly just off the-

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got no flying. I used my only flying potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. All right, so we're talking our way out of it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna call out. I'm calling out, "Member of the Clasp entering. I need to parlay."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those of you that have darkvision, you can see some features, they all are humanoid, around human height, a few that are smaller, whether they be younger or halfling or gnomish in origin, you can't really make out their details in this circumstance, but they all close in as you guys all stand there in the center of the hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do start unlacing, and I say, I'm one of you. And I show the tattoo on my back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this happens, you can see there's a part in the crowd, and one much larger than the rest of the members of the Clasp steps forward, pushing others out of the way. You see a very thick square jaw piercing out from underneath the shadowed hood, and the hand pulls it back and as you can now see the crooked pointed ears, snarling nose and underbite of a mostly orcish half-orc, one you've encountered once before--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's Modeth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The orc steps forward and looks about the group and goes, (grunts) "Seems like you stumbled into an early grave."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've a fucked up past with this organisation but I've come to tell you-- And I'm pointing at the tattoo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches out and grabs your arm and spins you around to look at the tattoo on your back violently. Like a ragdoll. You're being treated like a child. (grunts) Releases you for a second, as you fall off-balance for a second but catch yourself. He has his other hand at his belt side, and you can see what looks to be the the pommel of the dagger at the ready and he goes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uriel wants him. You are in danger. This whole organisation is in danger with him here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Silence! Who else knows you're here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not a soul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait a second. I do know you. Customs department, wasn't it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've been promoted since then. I'm now a supervisor of-- it was a ruse. I apologise for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As we found out. So you break back into our facility--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't exactly break in, we just kind of-- I'm just shutting up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a member of the Clasp. He gained entry the way that you do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He brings in outsiders after being warned not to return with them. Yet you say you are here "for a-- who was it?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you care that the Emperor knows you're holding a person he wants?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He won't be held for long. You can tell the Emperor he's not a worry of ours soon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's he going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a traitor to the kingdom. Uriel wants him, you are bringing danger upon this house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uriel's useless."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Uriel has a lot of gold and will probably give a reward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "We have our hand in their coffers whether we get a reward or not."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not the kind of reward he's already offering you. We come bearing an offering from Sovereign Uriel himself in exchange for this man. I reach into my bag and I produce--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No gold. No money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The very elegantly carved box I had made that contains the magical blue shard that we discovered many, many years ago, and I open it just for a moment and close it and say, this is the Shard of Kara. It is a magical item that can grant the user one wish, any wish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Scanlan, you said we were going to keep that for ourselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did. But it's clear that this man knows who we are and why we've come.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As a last resort we are cleared to offer this to you in exchange for your prisoner, or is he-- are you holding him as a prisoner or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He shushes you. Make a deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I help him? Can I assist that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, you would be, so go ahead and that would give you advantage on this, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Deception or persuasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is deception.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What in the living--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me see your box."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hush!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is activated by a secret chant that we will only tell you once we are safe and the prisoner-- or keep-- I don't know. Are you keeping him as a prisoner or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He waves his hand and shushes you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, as soon as we get the man, you get the chant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Daxio, huh? (huffs) He just paid us a rather large sum of money to produce documentation and "acquire transit to Ank'harel. We've kept him here while we've prepared his documentation and we're "to send him on his way through our tunnels to the docks. So you're asking us to betray a client of "the Clasp?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And avoid the hammer of the Empire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And keep the money at the same time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds to me like you just won twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches his hand out for the box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can inspect it, scan it for magic if you'd like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes the box and hands it to one of his compatriots, who takes it and inspects it and pulls out a small glass, puts it over his eye--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I Druidcraft a little bit and Druidcraft a little bit of breeze seeping from the box?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull out a small note that I hold in my right hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight-of-hand check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sleight of hand?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You mutter beneath your breath and swivel your hand for a second as he hands-- the other individual inspecting it with the glass monocle looking piece. (whoosh) Wind drifts around it and you can see the wood itself almost shimmer as if the grain of the wood is moving in a pattern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hold up a beautiful elegant note that I show in my hand and put it in my breast pocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. We have him in holding, awaiting his documents. I'll show you. I'll leave the door "open, we'll clear the halls. Do what you must. We will not be involved. You have an hour."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all we need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is your password?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once he is free, then you get-- in our custody, then you get the note.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll leave it outside the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) He puts his hand like this and other individuals of the Clasp back out and leave into the hallway behind you and he leads you to follow him and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unnecessary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was going for it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We had the mark!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this deception, what is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes a few steps and turns and looks at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You never know, it acts in mysterious ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (box lid creaks)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Opens the box. Inspects the piece of blue crystal--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I Druidcraft a gust coming out of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would not recommend it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks over at the gentleman who inspected it earlier and nods his head. "Accepted." And they continue walking forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lucky fucking druid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is the piece you put in the actual--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a blue shard that we found in-- long, long ago-- it's real crystal and it's real magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. I know what that is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it was sufficient upon inspection for this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, I think it opens a portal to another plane.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what it is, but it's magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it the one we got at last Winter's Crest? That one? The one that we were using shards of it to carve through dimensions? Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It had a few uses. So as you guys move into the hallway, a bunch of the Clasp members leave, you're led down a couple of doors on the left and right. You guys recognise these, these are the holding cells that you guys were held shortly after your battle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep, we were held in these cells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) Turns around and the rest of the Clasp scatter out of the hallway. He puts the box away in his cloak and he says, "One hour. Do as you must."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take the keys. We've got two to choose from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's at the door. He unlocked one for you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no. But there's two cells? Or has he opened the cell that he's in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three cells in this hallway. The middle cell is the one that he led you to and unlocked for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he steps away, looks at the rest of you guys--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are five blocks on each side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and then vanishes down the hallway. So it's now just you guys in this hallway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you give him the password?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have not given him the password yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because he already opened the box.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Daxio, we've got your papers, c'mon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just, because I foresee something possibly happening here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we were saying the password made it work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think he knows we're full of shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he knows it's super powerful magic anyway and he doesn't give a shit and he's taking it anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's good, because man, this was some bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. All right. So, you guys are all gathered in this hallway. Who is standing where?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where did he leave from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys entered this direction and they scattered this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to lock eyes with Grog and motion him towards one side of the door, and I'm gonna take the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Wall of Stone the other side of the hallway? Just to block them from coming down that hallway again. Can you block, Wall of Stone that other side?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and block in the entryway for good measure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought the one he left through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, they left this way. Okay, so you wall this off?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Why not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is now a wall of stone in the middle of that hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hope we don't have to leave that way, but she can just dispel it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we can get it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, who is standing where? Is there any particular placement you guys wish to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax and I are on either side of the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys are here. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So is this leading into something crazy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Into his cell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Into a labyrinth? Or just his cell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far so you know, a cell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As far as we know, just a cell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He just completely took an expensive thing and left us to rot, pretty much, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone else want to change this arrangement?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are in a giant death cluster. How about we spread out a touch? Like two people to a door in that hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll take the other door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take the other door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go down with Scanlan on the other one so I can ranged attack--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just saying, if he took out a magical spectacle and knows we're full of shit, we're all gonna die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gonna stand with my back against the wall that she's built up. Like that, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did half-orc dude say he was just in this cell? That's all he said?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They essentially unlocked the cell, they're walking away, they're turning their heads and letting you do what you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do we know that's the one that he's in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you go in and kill some shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's good with this arrangement?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there any other entrances or anything else around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's just this door and this door and they're both currently--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fine, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I called out already.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Let us go ahead for the sake of this, roll initiative depending on what happens going forward just so we have that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just in case, eh?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just because I have a fear of construction paper. Advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did construction paper do to you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did it not do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right so. 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what did Ashley get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine. Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I would expect nothing less.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like to think that she looks both ways before attacking just to see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. You rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's doing what now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax is our point man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're both at the door and I called out, so I guess we'll wait a moment to see if he'll--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A moment passes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to check? I can open the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I already went stealth earlier too, I got a 25 on the stealth check. I can go again if you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to try and stealth in the room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we wait like 30 seconds and nothing happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing happens, yeah. Okay, make another stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. 21. I'm doing nothing, I'm just standing in place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He thinks you're going in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you push in the doorway, quietly, you see, for a moment inside, you can see there's a little bit of light from overheard in the room that lights it up. You see in the distance what looks to be a latrine in the far corner, and as soon as you peek in the doorway, you glance out the side of your eyeline, and you immediately see a figure, and a flash of metal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll use Uncanny Dodge, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unless it's an area effect. If it's an area effect I'll use Evasion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is a direct attack, as a giant metallic glaive comes down to you. That is going to be a 19 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, slashing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine points with the Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At this point now you reveal the interior, and right here at the door, you see there, standing, Daxio right before you. Armored up, sweat on the brow, holding what looks to be a large glaive, a halberd-type weapon with a giant bladed tip, which (whack) strikes you and gets back in defensive position. "You! I knew it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't he old?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Daxio's a mature elf.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I move and then hold my turn? Can I move at all? Hold the actions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've moved in, you could ready your action if you'd like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I'm saying, could I just use my movement and then wait?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could if you'd like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go all the way around, circle him, and then wait. And then my trigger is when Grog steps up to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't move through other creatures. In this place and area--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I can't go around him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he has you blocked off at the doorway, and has like squared off with you right now, with the glaive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Grog considered five feet away from him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is considered five feet away from you, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Then I'm going to sneak attack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not five feet away from him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In order to sneak attack a creature, you have to have an ally adjacent to the enemy, not to you. The idea is, they're being harried by two different points and can't form a good defense

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, all right. Then I'm going to use Disengage, I'm going to step five feet back. I'm going to use one action to click my Boots of Haste. And then can I attack, because the boots are on, after that? Then I'll throw a dagger at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. 11 from the Keen Dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. We have now officially, as of this moment, entered combat. You technically would be next in the initiative round at this point, but you're holding your action until-- what are you holding your action until?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was only going to do that if you told me that I could move around him, now that I know that I can't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you did that, okay. Okay, never mind. Gotcha. All right, cool. So that will be, in theory, the first opening to the battle. Now we start the initiative order. All right. So now we're starting off. Vex, you're up first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I call out: Daxio, don't be a moron. Step outside and lower your weapon, you're surrounded.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were using your deep voice, so you could--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My deep voice!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could get advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To intimidate him more. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Okay. You shout it out, and it echoes through the hallway. Who knows if it's landed or had an effect, you can't see him from your current perspective.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I walk forward or should I keep--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's in there by himself, and no other are enemies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: SAM; Why don't you check the other door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoever's in there is locked in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm just going to-- I'm going to stay where I am, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So you stay there. Next up is Vax and Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to disengage and back up against the back wall--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've already disengaged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Already have? All right, so I'm going to back up and hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you back up-- You notice at this point, as you step five feet back that that weapon he's carrying is pretty long and has a pretty decent reach. You may have to disengage to get out of there without taking another strike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But if I were to go left or right, would I be out of range of hitting him because of the doorway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would be over here, probably, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if I move sideways either way I can't hit him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm not going to do that. I'm going to just step back against the back wall and hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you using your disengage action or not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was I within five feet of him? Yes, I'm going to use disengage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you use your bonus action to disengage. Because you're not used to fighting these long polearm weapons, as you begin to take another step back, you realize he can actually hit you from further away than you expect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Can I have used my bonus action to hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Go ahead and roll stealth. All right, and now you're going to go ahead and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You vanish. Hold until what? What do you want to be the trigger?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Until Grog steps in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, next up is Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a grille on that door? Any kind of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is a solid door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is a solid door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is currently open, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no, I mean on the door that I'm next to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, that is closed. That is a solid door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold-- I'm going to stay where I am and hold my action until I see somebody I want to shoot in the hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. All right, that brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bellow out: you're in for the fight of your life if you don't drop your polearm. The next thing that hits the ground if you don't will be your skull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you using your action to intimidate?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll an intimidate check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you have some sort of intimidate thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not in a frenzied rage, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Okay. You can see now, with the blade forward, sweat dripping down his face, this look of a cornered animal, and as the sword comes out with a ringing sound in the air, the shadows coalesce around the black obsidian blade. He gives you a look and he's questioning his current circumstance, but seems to be holding firm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I have left of my turn? Anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your bonus action and your move.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bonus action. Bonus action. What's a bonus action? What can I do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what you can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're in frenzied rage it would be another attack, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that makes me tired as shit. No, I won't do anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, that's going to be a 21 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. This is going to be, as the glaive sweeps under your legs, trying to gash across, that's eight points of slashing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Halved, because I'm raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus an additional five points from his superiority die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From his what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Superiority.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's attempting to trip you. Go ahead and make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ability checks, not your saving throws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strength checks and strength saving throws, advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that what it says?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Advantage on all strength checks and strength saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then yeah, you would have advantage on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Haha. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. You stand firm in your position. The blade strikes and gashes open a part of your shin, but you just hold your place there, leaning against the wall for support. Doesn't affect you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So 13 total halved, so seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hm. Next is going to-- You know what, he's going to go ahead and attempt to strike you two more times. That is going to be a 16 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this one is going to take a minus five on that one. That was a-- Oh, okay. All right, that's 24.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to peek around Grog, and try and cast Hold Person on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the DC on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 18. Just my spell DC, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, that is 17. However, he is going to use Indomitable to reroll a saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 20. So as you finish the spell, you can see his head beginning to be affected and he shrugs it off through sheer force of will. Anything else you want to do on your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This guy's annoying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. Ah! Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends Keyleth's turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just said yes. No, wait, I don't have it, I don't have it. Nope. Never mind. No! Go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't see him yet or I can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not right now. You just see this blade going (whoosh whoosh) out the doorway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I saw Keyleth cast that spell, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I run up a little closer to be in visual range, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you can see him, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will do the same fucking thing. And I'll cast Hold Person on him as well, with my Hand Cone of Clarity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to use his other use of Indomitable to attempt to reroll that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has two?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two, but this is his last one. That brings him to a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just beats your DC.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is that what he was doing against my spell save? Is that what it is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will, with my bonus, can I talk to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on! Come on! That's my intimidation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. He seems visibly shaken by the presence of the two of you and the fact that he can't move right now. That's the best I can give you at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we take his weapon from him since he can't move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I intimidate him to give me his weapon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't move.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He can't move? Can I go up and try to take his weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you step up into the hallway. And you walk up to him and he's looking at you, sweat dripping down his face, hair matted across the side of his chin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it, Pike!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an intimidation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get more flies with honey.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck. Well, it's probably not going to work with a four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a four? The eyes-- Though frozen, he still manages to roll his eyes, as the armored gnome walks up and requests his weapon, and is no longer paying attention.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I just take it from him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a strength check. Just roll and add your strength modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, it might be higher than that. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back up. Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I guess I walk-- Look at us all bunched up in this little hall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. This is a bad circumstance for a party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should probably just, you know, give up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You have him held?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's held. And also, we probably can't tell if he's giving up because he probably can't talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, until Grog. I want to hold my action until Grog gets him to move. Until he moves out of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What action do you want to hold? What are you going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have to say what I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want to know what you're readying, essentially.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to, if anything attacks us, I want to be able to attack it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then Vax, same?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to wait to see what Grog does. As soon as Grog's done, I'm throwing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I squeeze by Pike, or do I need to pick her up and move her out of the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, being held doesn't threaten the square and you can probably walk around Pike, so you can get into the room. I'd say right now, because he can't really defend it or keep you at bay with his weapon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Walk, that's cute. I would like to run past Pike and bear-form tackle him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! All right, so we're doing a full--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Full shoulder in the gut, wrapping my arms around his legs, picking him up and throwing him on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you wish we had Trinket now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's like football drills? Running into a-- What are those things called?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Guy's standing up and you're just driving into him with your whole body mass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why do we need Trinket? We have a small giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Yes! 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? That's fine. He can't even defend at this point. So you push him back five feet and you manage to push your way into this and shove him further into the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But not to the ground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He wanted to take him to the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I wanted to tackle him and be on top of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That all you're going to do on your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't attack, right? That's all I got?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can move.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I'll stay there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we able to tell from what Grog just did what he does? Does he react, does he just go (grunts).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just falls over, because he can't move his muscles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we move his muscles or is he frozen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean use him like Weekend at Bernie's?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we handcuff him while he's frozen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was going to say. Can we tie him? Tie him up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can attempt to if you get to him on your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hog-tie him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you finish your turn? Comes to Daxio's turn. Daxio's attempting to resist. That's a natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Weren't you holding your turn until Grog moved him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Until Grog did his thing. Yeah, but I wanted to see what happened. So it would be after this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So as Daxio is on the ground, muscles lax for a second and looks up at you and can't do anything, because that was his turn, but is no longer seemingly affected by the ability. And just looks up at you with eyes flicking around with thoughts and trying to formulate a plan here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, like what you see, don't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, what did you want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. So I'm hasted, because I did the boots, so I'm going to use Haste to climb through my friends, over Pike, under Grog's legs, and I'm going to-- I'm going to flip daggers over and I'm going to bean this guy in the face a couple of times. Should be a Sneak Attack the first time, because of Grog being there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. That is 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30? Landing on the opposite side of the room. On the other side of Daxio. You jump off of Grog's back, land, and go for your attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I'm going to blunt-edge him three times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on these attacks, because he's currently prone on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the first one is a natural 20. That's also sneak attack, so that doesn't get quadrupled, does it? It's already doubled from sneak attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Well, no, no. It's doubled because it's a critical hit. That's all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh right. Sneak Attack you just get the additional six, remember?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Okay. So-- And then the second one is a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? Both hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. And did I use all my movement to climb through the scrum or do I have my third attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The movement wouldn't affect your attack at all. Your movement is just your movement action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I do have a third attack, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would in theory, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does hit, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So the first one, blunt, using the end, is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then add your six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 11. Two, three, seven, ten, 15, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 times two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 19 times two, right, is 38. Plus the seven, so 46 for the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 46 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's blunt, though. And two plus six is eight on the second. And seven on the third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, got it. So as you slam the daggers into each side of his head, you can see, cracking the side of the temple, blood beginning to pour out the side of where the impact hit. He's staggered momentarily from the impact, but after the third strike hit, manages to bring the glaive up to try and defend himself at this point. That would be it. That ends your turn, that brings us--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I use all my movement to get there. All of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try and get away if you like. With Haste you would have more movement, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take-- I'll go back ten feet. See what happens. He's on his back, so he could probably take a swing at me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He tries to, but it's with disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, rolled a two. That (whoomph) hits the tile. All right, that brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's down on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, I can. Okay. Yeah, I'll go ahead and vine him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grasping Vine? To where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To-- Oh, right, because it's got to be against a wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It can't be the ground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can it be the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can probably be the ground if you want to, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can I essentially just entangle him into the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So is now (groans) and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he's down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, technically, the spell doesn't grapple, it just pulls things towards it. It just moves things around the battlefield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the vine pulls him closer to the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do Entangle instead and just do a concentrated Entangle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Entangle would affect the entire floor of that room. Yeah, Grasping Vine-- The vine's around him, you don't know how much of an effect it'll have when it comes to his turn, but you'll find out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It may help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was also your bonus action. You can still use your action to cast another second level if you wanted to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cast Speak with Animals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Commune with Nature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I can try and Hold Person him again. Do we want to do that? I can Hold Person him again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We want to hear what he has to say, I think, at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a Druidcraft, Matt? A Druidcraft where I druidcraft a vine around his ankles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out of the Grasping Vine, a little vine goes around the legs. It's more of a grapevine. A really pretty to grow plant life on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A grapevine? Grapevines are pretty hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A white or red grapevine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A red one. Okay, Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? Jesus. Hey! Hey, dude! Come on! Can you give up, please? Can you please give up? I'm just going to intimidate him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll an intimidation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on! Roll so high.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, that was a dead roll. That was the same roll, but not wonky. This is intimidate? 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get the sense now that these rounds of perpetual pressuring Daxio and now recovering his position in this fight and you guys have stepped into this room with him, he's become less of a sensible individual and more of a desperate man lashing out as a last stand. And your intimidation shouts are falling upon deaf ears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that end your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Is that my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say because you're already there and shouting at him, it can be a bonus action. So if you want to take your action still.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do anything, I'm behind all those fucking people. Well, if we're fighting then, I can't do much. I will just-- I will blind him this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll blind him at a level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, level three blind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Blind him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With science.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At level three just means you can target an additional creature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, I just don't have any level two slots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so spend it. No worries. All right, so that's a constitution saving throw. That is a 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 19, so he saves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so he saves, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This guy sucks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, I can blind one other person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nah, no, I won't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, jeez. I don't know what to do. So intimidating is not working?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can't we just take him out of there now that he's all tied up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not tied up. The vine grabbed around, but doesn't appear to be really changing his physicality.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I make, with my Spiritual Weapon, a sort of-- holding like a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a weapon. Spiritual Weapon. Weapon's in the name. What kind of weapon would you want to summon?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe with a little stinger on the end. Just to listen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, a little lasso there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So his arms--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, we'll have to see.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll and add your spell attack. It has advantage, because he's prone still.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's also now grappled.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's also now grappled. Okay. Can the stinger go right here to his neck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. It's right there. The spiritual energy wraps around the body. He's held there, with the vine both holding him there. The stinger (swish) up over the throat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brother. Come on. What are you gonna do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We take him the fuck out of here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, we got to take him out, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That the end of your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. But I can still-- has he dropped his weapon? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The weapon's still clutched to him and wrapped--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try to intimidate him with my extra bonus attack and tell him to drop his weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the lasso and the vine. And intimidation doesn't seem to affect him anymore.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long does the spiritual weapon last?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's concentration so can be a number of rounds as long as she uses her bonus action to maintain it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So concentrated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, I would recommend it. Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me? Okay. Oh no, should I go in the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Room's kind of busy, in my opinion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? I'm gonna Hunter's Mark him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're gonna get over-- You still can't see him at that distance, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've stayed at the far back. Um, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well then fuck it, I'm gonna just stay where I am.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's keep point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gonna keep point. I'm gonna stay at the back of the hallway, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vax, Percy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Again, still hiding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna knock this fool out. Okay, yeah, and you guys are right on top of him so first one is-- and advantage because he's grappled and down, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So first one is 22. Second one is a natural 20. Third one is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go for it. All three attacks hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so the first one is regular attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can't choose which one is the sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, there is no sneak attack-- oh yeah, yeah. I meant that the critical was on the second one. That's what I meant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no worries.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the first one is 11 plus double this. 11 plus four, eight, 12, 15, 16, 22. So that's 44 plus--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't double it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. 22 plus seven is 30. I have three attacks! 31. Second one is-- that's easy. 14. And the third attack is ten. The second one was critical, but much smaller.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (fighting sounds) You slam down on the face. You can see nose actually breaks under the blunt of the weapon and blood begins to pour out of his nostrils. And he's fighting now and coughing up--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's gonna tie him up? Who's in the fucking room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm gonna jump back ten feet again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And pull him out of the room. Anyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Percy, you're holding?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm gonna take manacles out of the Bag of Holding. Since he's holding-- his arms are pinned to his chest. And I'm gonna clasp it on both of his wrists. And then I'm gonna pick that motherfucker up on my shoulder and walk out of the room. I'd like to try.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I can help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, by just controlling it with your mind. So I will say, go ahead and make an athletics check, just to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strength or athletics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This'd be athletics. Athletics is better for you, technically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it is. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You lift him over your shoulder, past Pike. Take him out into the hallway. You gonna keep him on your shoulder? Or slam him down?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was gonna slam him into the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wham, whack, into the wall. Go ahead and roll 1d6 plus your strength modifier. For the sheer force of this, this near currently helpless individual slammed against the stone wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I toss Grog my-- some of the infinite rope and tell him to tie him up, tie up his ankles too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're holding? Sure. So Vex yells out to you and throws you the source of the infinite rope, you grab and begin to, if you want to, start tying up. All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Loot tying? I mean, rage tying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, great. Now it comes to Daxio's turn. He's currently trying to resist the current grappling and your attempt to tie him. That's gonna be a natural 20 on athletics check.

lines.name: LAURA
