lines.text: Yeah, but he's got his ankles tied up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not no more he don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the manacles are there. You turn was to lift him up and slam him into the wall, and you're beginning to wrap him up. His turn immediately afterward is he breaks out of the lasso.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The spirit weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spirit weapon lasso, and at that point, still manages to (grunts) get back with half the movement onto his feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't take my turn now, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, after this. He still has the manacles on, which holding the polearm now wouldn't do too much of a disadvantage to him. So I say this round it doesn't do anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, it'd be a close grip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The grip's pretty tight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He wouldn't be able to get a firm grip on the swing, it'd be like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let him be a hardass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As a fight-- as a staff user that's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what? Bring it, bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So Daxio gets up. Seeing Grog had taken the majority of the attacks and looking over at the druid that made the vine curl and drag him to the ground. Turns over and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Sup?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Makes three strikes against you. The first one is going to be-- all right, so that is a 15?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Third one-- is going to be a 17?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 17 is exactly what he needed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does hit, all right. It's going to try and trip-attack you, so you take as this third strike-- 12 points of slashing damage. And make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, and you're prone so each attack has no disadvantage against you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So all three hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got you girl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this all for that staff comment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of slashing damage from the first strike. That's the critical.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next one is 24 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this last one is 21 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. She's standing. Or I mean, she's not, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Daxio's turn. You're up, Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh wait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, Percy, you're making your action, that's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With the new pistol.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With the new weapon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That might explode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, drop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength saving throw?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me double-check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I made a change to that, because-- That's gonna be a 21.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Against my?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'm pretty sure that he resists it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Against my DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against your DC, yeah. So you take your first shot. It does damage-- It does no damage, this is the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this does no damage. I don't know what my DC is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me go ahead and check real fast. Stay with me folks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this gun called Little Sparky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the arms you said, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hands, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as Keyleth is on the ground being hacked by this glaive, he lifts up again for another brutal strike and (shooting sound) this echoing blast sound hits as the glaive is knocked out of his hands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just go to my earpiece and I go: Thank you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we-- are we going to go with that discussion we had about the torso shot, or are we dropping that for now? Dropping it for now? Totally okay. In that case, I'm just going to take two sharpshooter shots to drag him down a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 18, 19, 20, 27 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's six, 22 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Little Sparky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 to hit, yeah, just hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's 23 points of damage. And that's all she wrote.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. How do you want to do this? (gasps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, keep him alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think we have a chance now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking dick, he deserves it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to take both of those shots, and try and graze his collarbones with both those shots. It'll heal, but he's gonna have a really hard time lifting his arms, for like the next couple months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So with those shots (gunshot) a splash of blood with bits of splintered bone come shooting out of the half-plate armor he's been wearing as the metal itself blows open from the impact of the first blast. With the glaive still clinking to the ground behind him and him reacting, the first impact sends him back and he leans against the wall, looks up to see the source of the impact. Looks into your eyes for a second and before he has a moment of reaction the second blast comes out (gunshot) shattering the other part of the clavicle. You can now see the armor sundered on each shoulder and blood beginning to pour over the sides of where the armor's been torn. He slumps to the ground (groaning).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're lucky. It'll even heal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (panting) "Do what you must. But I am his blood. His dominion will call back, call me back "when everything else has fallen into nothing."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you talking about Dres-- Vecna? Are you talking about Vecna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (low chuckle)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's a yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, that didn't go very well. I'm afraid you might be out of luck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What say we drag this asshole out of here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's get this fucker out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, tie him up! And let's get you, do you need--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Keyleth gets up and bleeding from my mouth. And I just take him and I grab him by his face. and I just say: Fucking traitor. And I spit a big glob of blood in his face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And she's the nice one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pick him up, I put him over my shoulder and we start to walk out of the hall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I'm gonna heal Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He's-- in the process of you tying him up and jostling him over, he falls pretty much nearly unconscious. He's fading in and out of consciousness right now. Every now and then you feel a little chuckle come out of him on your shoulder. (dark chuckle) and then passes out again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pick up the glaive also.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what was I at? 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, you heal 30 points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you do now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Daxio over your shoulder, you guys quickly head back into the hallway, emptied, the doorway still lies open as you guys left it. And--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get that piece of chalk and in thieves' cant I'm going to write on the wall: Much appreciated, Uriel sends his regards, V.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, okay. You close the door behind you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to check those other rooms?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what about the room he was in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean no? What if he had-- he had stuff to travel with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true, he had a lot of money with him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make an investigation roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gonna hang out by the door, I'm gonna let him hang out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm an idiot, so I'm going to roll a six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go in and do it too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I wedge the door open or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Underneath his bed, up inside the actual wooden frame of the bed itself, in part of the cushion, you feel there is a large sack of something. You pull it out and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hang on to that. I need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure you do, but you lost yours so I'm gonna hold on to it for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've proven to be irresponsible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have had the most money of all of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It contains, I'll say for the sake of-- you're probably counting it as you go up the stairs, because you're Vex. 3,002 gold pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm back to normal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're not. Because it's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I found it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, but we took it away from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No you didn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes we did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't even find it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We saw you find it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excuse me, no interest in the other rooms, or shall we leave?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's just go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're outstaying our welcome, let's go now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys head back up the stairway, leading back into the storage room, outside of the kitchen. How are you going to proceed from the kitchen?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could set it on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The cooks are back in the kitchen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you glance around and you look, you can listen. You do hear the sound of pots and various sounds--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck are the cooks gonna do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're on the fucking council.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, what are they gonna do now? Oh, hang on. Are we about to walk through a very crowded bar?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're not. We're going to leave through the alley, where Trinket is waiting. We can toss him over Trinket's back. We just walk on out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We just walk through the kitchen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys head up to the kitchen, as you guys come stomping up in succession, carrying the bleeding and unconscious Daxio on the back, the younger gentleman who's working in the kitchen who's in the middle of cooking something in a large cast iron pan, goes: "You can't be in here!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're leaving, we're leaving!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And my compliments to the chef. Good night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then you guys head back into the alleyway. Trinket eagerly (bear grunts).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey darling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Licks your face. (slurping sounds)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you do us a favor and carry him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comes up to you and nudges you to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I tell them: I'll catch up, guys. I have to say goodbye to my mates.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we frisk him while we're waiting? LaURA: I like it. Can I dig in his pockets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Digging in his pockets, you find a strange holy symbol that appears to be a skull that is missing the left side of its face.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I do a religion check on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a holy symbol per se, more than it's just some sort of a token or some sort of a-- it has a purpose that isn't magical.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is magic? ASHLEY & TRAVIS: It's not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, while you're doing that, Scanlan, you head back into the tavern, and in the time that's passed, you can see now your band with Dr. Dranzel, they're all gathered together and they're finishing up their drinks, and it looks like they're ready to go ahead and find their way out on the town for the evening, and as soon as you walk into the room they all look over, "Scanlan! (laughs) "Good to see you, friend."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, hi, sorry I disappeared there for a while, I just got a little distracted. Just wanted to say it was wonderful running into you, if you'll be around for another week, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Another week, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, our paths may cross again, and if you know, or can ask around where Greyskull Keep is, come pay us a visit. I would love to talk to you about the past, and history, and your travels and mine, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Greyskull Keep, you say?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's actually called Greyskull Embassy, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll see you at your keep."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I turn to-- what is her name? Kaylie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kaylie, who is already behind you, as you turn she goes, "Greyskull Keep, is it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it is. My room's on the second floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Playing the long game, I like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we'll end it for tonight, unless you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're taking him to Uriel, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just as a minor detail, as we're walking, almost like a magic trick, I wanna grab my cloak and yank it off Pike and wrap it up and put it into my pocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're taking him to Uriel, we're taking him to Uriel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flowers are still standing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not taking him to our place, we're taking him to Uriel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to your keep, or are you going to Uriel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To Uriel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you make a quick turn and start heading back towards the Cloudtop District. And that's where we'll end it for the evening!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Walk off into the sunset, credits roll, they turn right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit, forgot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Freeze frame!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 2,600 gold to get some booty, I like it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, we didn't get to talk about your sword!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, never had an opportunity to discuss it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, haven't had a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I guess you'll have to Skype in next week.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I might be able to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you can, that'd be awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't make me talk to him, because it won't go well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No no no, no. We just didn't get a chance to talk to him about his sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, cool. Back in the swing of things, our first game of the year, got some story beats completed, and some other mysteries put in there, just a fun little step into Scanlan's old world, that was pretty cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Scanlan backstory.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wanna get some more into that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, and we're dropping shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, popcorn down. So next week we're doing Critmas, next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we're doing Critmas next week, so be ready for that. Gonna watch us see what the new year has in store, looks like they've got some great possible charity gifts coming, I'm excited to see what they got us, so. Well all right then! We're gonna go ahead and get ourselves out and sleeping for tomorrow morning. Thank you, guys, for coming and geeking with us, we'll see you next week, and happy new year, guys.
